Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::hasBatteri.walmart_attribute_doc: Contains Batteries ==> "Battery or battery containing product" is defined by Company to include any item of Merchandise that is a battery or any component of Merchandise, including reusable packaging intended to stay in use with the item, containing a battery of any chemistry/ type. Mark Y if this definition applies to your product.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::hasWarrant.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::warrantyTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::warrantyUR.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::isChemical.walmart_attribute_doc: Contains Chemical ==> ‘Chemical’ is defined by Walmart to include any item of Merchandise that contains a powder, gel, paste, or liquid that is not intended for human consumption. ‘Chemical’ also includes the following types items that ARE intended for human consumption, inhalation, or absorption, or labeled with drug facts: All over-the-counter medications, including: Lozenges, pills or capsules (e.g. pain relievers; allergy medications; as well as vitamins and supplements that contain metals); Medicated swabs and wipes, acne medication, and sunscreen; Medicated patches (such as nicotine patches); Liquids (e.g. cough medicine, medicated drops, nasal spray and inhalers); Medicated shampoos, gums, ointments and creams; Medicated lip balm, lip creams and petroleum jelly; Contraceptive foam, films, and spermicides; and Product/Equipment sold with chemicals (e.g. vaporizer sold with medication) and electronic cigarettes. If your product meets this definition, Mark Y and ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::hasPricePe.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Price Per Unit ==> Mark as "Y" if your item is any of the following: food used for human or domestic animal consumption; ingredients added to food; napkins; tissues; toilet paper; foil, plastic wrap, wax paper, parchment paper; paper towels; disposable plates, bowls, and cutlery; detergents, soaps, waxes, and other cleansing agents; non-prescription drugs, female hygeine products, and toiletries; automotive fluids and cleaners; rock salt; diapers, pullups and swimmers; fertilizer; kitty litter.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::pricePerUn.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Quantity of Units ==> Enter the quantity of units for the item, based on the "PPU Unit of Measure" you selected. For example, a gallon of milk should be 128. NOTE: Do not enter the price.

PPU Unit of Measure ==> The units that will be used to calculate the "Price Per Unit" for your product. For example, a gallon of milk has a "PPU Unit of Measure" of Fluid Ounces. NOTE: This may not be the Unit of Measure on the label.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::isProp65Wa.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::prop65Warn.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::requiresTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::countryOfO.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::shelfLife\.walmart_attribute_doc: Shelf Life ==> The length of time that the product can be stored without becoming unfit for consumption or after which the product is no longer at best quality, measured in days.
Shelf Life ==> The length of time that the product can be stored without becoming unfit for consumption or after which the product is no longer at best quality, measured in days.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::hasFuelCon.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::fabricCare.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::fabricCont.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::batteriesR.walmart_attribute_doc: Batteries Required ==> Are batteries required to use this item?

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::instructio.walmart_attribute_doc: Instructions ==> Detailed information telling how the product should be operated or assembled.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::sportsLeag.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::isPortable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Portable ==> Is the item designed to be easily moved?

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::globalBran.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::autographe.walmart_attribute_doc: Autographed by ==> The full name of the person who has autographed this copy.

Animal\/AnimalEverythingElse::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::shortD.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::keyFea.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::manufa.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::modelN.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::multip.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::countP.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::pieceC.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::mainIm.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::produc.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::materi.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::global.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::covera.walmart_attribute_doc: Coverage Area ==> Measured in square feet.
Coverage Area ==> Measured in square feet.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::form.walmart_attribute_doc: Form ==> Describes the way the item is dispensed or consumed, including its texture or other physical characteristics.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::patter.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::paintF.walmart_attribute_doc: Paint Finish ==> Term to describe the paint's sheen when dry. Important selection factor that affects paint's shininess and durability.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::recomm.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Surfaces ==> The surfaces that a product is marketed for, or meant to be compatible with.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::assemb.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::rollLe.walmart_attribute_doc: Roll Length ==> For products that are packaged on a roll, the measurement of the length of the product.
Roll Length ==> For products that are packaged on a roll, the measurement of the length of the product.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::thickn.walmart_attribute_doc: Thickness ==> Measurement of the dimension between two surfaces. Thickness is an important feature for strength, fit and use. For example, 1/2 inch thick plywood is commonly used for walls, 3/4 inch for floors.

Thickness ==> Measurement of the dimension between two surfaces. Thickness is an important feature for strength, fit and use. For example, 1/2 inch thick plywood is commonly used for walls, 3/4 inch for floors.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::varian.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.
Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isPrim.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isProp.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::prop65.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::batter.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::batter.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::hasWar.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::warran.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::compos.walmart_attribute_doc: Composite Wood Certification Code ==> Composite Wood - Indicates if any portion of the item contains any of the following types of composite wood: hardwood plywood veneer core, hardwood plywood composite core, particleboard, or medium density fiber board (MDF). Enter the code corresponding to the highest formaldehyde emission level on any portion of the item. Code Definitions: 1 - Does not contain composite wood; 7 - Product is not CARB compliant and cannot be sold in California; 8 - Product is CARB compliant and can be sold in California.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::hasFue.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::hasIng.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::ingred.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::access.walmart_attribute_doc: Accessories Included ==> Listing of any supplementary items that come with the product. Important information for consumers because accessories typically provide additional convenience, utility, attractiveness or safety to or for a product.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::colorC.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::doorOp.walmart_attribute_doc: Door Opening Style ==> The type of door-opening motion.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isWate.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isFire.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Fire-Resistant ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to resist burning under certain conditions, as specified by the manufacturer. An important feature for products such as fire blankets, building materials, and safes.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::cleani.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::recomm.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isMade.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Made From Sustainable Materials ==> Y indicates the item is manufactured using methods and materials that support sustainable renewal and do not completely use up or destroy natural resources. Examples of materials that are considered sustainable include bamboo, cork, and natural wool fiber.

Is Made From Reclaimed Materials ==> Y indicates the item is made from material that was diverted from disposal as waste. For example, reclaimed flooring that is made from structural beams that have been salvaged and milled.
Is Made From Recycled Material ==> Indicates that the item is made from recycled materials.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::recycl.walmart_attribute_doc: Recycled Material Content ==> If item contains reused/recycled material, the percentage of all recycled material used to produce the item. This can also include specific material composition; cushions made from 30% recycled cotton fabric. Used to highlight sustainability to the customer.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::hasLow.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Low Emissivity ==> Y indicates the item is specially manufactured and rated to emit low levels of radiant heat. Typically a feature for building materials such as Low-E insulation and glass that have special reflective coatings.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::powerT.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isEner.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Energy Star-Certified ==> Indicate Y if the product has been certified by the EPA Energy Star program.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::pileHe.walmart_attribute_doc: Pile Height ==> The thickness of the carpet measured from the surface to its backing. Important selection factor for consumers because pile height affects a carpet’s insulation properties, ease of maintenance, and appearance.

Pile Height ==> The thickness of the carpet measured from the surface to its backing. Important selection factor for consumers because pile height affects a carpet’s insulation properties, ease of maintenance, and appearance.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::grade.walmart_attribute_doc: Grade ==> The industry designation based on characteristics such quality, size and appearance. Attribute used for a wide variety of products including building materials. Important selection criteria for consumers based on budget and use. For example for structural framing lumber, grade is an indicator of strength and working properties.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::finene.walmart_attribute_doc: Fineness ==> A measure of the size of aggregate in the product. Important selection criteria for various construction uses. For example, sand with a fineness modulus of greater than 3.2 is not recommended for making good concrete.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isOdor.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Odorless ==> Y indicates the item does not have an odor or smell. Used for products that typically have an odor. Consumers often prefer odorless versions of products including paints, solvents, and lamp oils.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::vocLev.walmart_attribute_doc: VOC Level ==> The percent of Volatile Organic Compounds included in the product. Typical products include solvents, paints, and cleaning supplies. Attribute enables consumers with health concerns to select products with low VOC levels.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::featur.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::keywor.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::dryTim.walmart_attribute_doc: Dry Time ==> Amount of time that it takes for an application of this product to dry, as specified by the manufacturer.
Dry Time ==> Amount of time that it takes for an application of this product to dry, as specified by the manufacturer.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isPref.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prefinished ==> Y indicates item has been treated or coated by the manufacturer. Used for items such as hardwood flooring that have unfinished equivalents.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isRead.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Ready-to-Use ==> Y indicates product does not need additional preparation as compared to product counterparts. For example, a paint that does not need thinner added before use.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isFast.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Fast Setting ==> Y indicates the product is specifically manufactured to require less time to set as compared to equivalent products. For example, a fast-setting concrete that sets up or hardens in 20-40 minutes as compared to other types of concrete that require several days to harden.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isMold.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Mold-Resistant ==> Y indicates the product is specifically manufactured to resist the growth of mold. For example, building materials such as drywall that are certified to be mold resistant based on specific tests.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isComb.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Combustible ==> Y indicates the manufacturer has specified that the substance (usually a liquid) is combustible and has the potential to ignite. Combustible items have a flash point between 100-200 degrees F and pose a potential safety hazard. Examples of products that are classified as flammable include some paints, solvents, and petroleum products. Note: If product is labeled as Flammable (has a flashpoint of less than 100 degrees F) item should be identified as Flammable vs. Combustible.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isFlam.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Flammable ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to resist burning under certain conditions, as specified by the manufacturer. An important feature for products such as fire blankets, building materials, and safes.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isBiod.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Biodegradable ==> Y indicates the product is specifically manufactured to have the capability of decomposed by bacteria or other living organisms. Used to identify this characteristic as a feature. Examples of products that have biodegradable versions include paint thinners and cleaning solvents.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::isWate.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Water Soluble ==> Y indicates the product can be dissolved in or by water. Used to identify a product for which water solubility would be a feature. For example, for ease of cleanup, consumers prefer wall paint that is water soluble.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::peiRat.walmart_attribute_doc: PEI Rating ==> The (Porcelain Enamel Institute) category rating that measures the hardness and durability of tile. Important for determination for appropriate use because not all tiles can be used for all areas. For example, PEI 1 tiles are more susceptible to wear and are therefore suitable for walls vs. PEI 5 tiles that are more resistant to abrasion and used for high-traffic floor areas.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::carpet.walmart_attribute_doc: Carpet Style ==> Common retail term describing the construction of the carpet based on treatment of the pile (loop pile, cut pile, or cut and loop pile). Used primarily for wall-to-wall carpet vs area rugs.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::acRati.walmart_attribute_doc: AC Rating ==> Represents a laminate's resistance to abrasion, impact, stains and cigarette burns. AC ratings also indicate that the product has been tested for the effects of furniture legs, castors and swelling along its edges.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::snowLo.walmart_attribute_doc: Snow Load Rating ==> The capability of the item such as a roof or awning to hold a live load due to the weight of snow on a surface. Value based a number of variables as specified by the manufacturer.

Snow Load Rating ==> The capability of the item such as a roof or awning to hold a live load due to the weight of snow on a surface. Value based a number of variables as specified by the manufacturer.

ToolsAndHardware\/BuildingSupply::doorSt.walmart_attribute_doc: Door Style ==> Descriptive term referring to the overall appearance or design of a door or doors as a component of an item such as the doors of cabinets, vanities, and storage sheds.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::lightBulbS.walmart_attribute_doc: Light Bulb Shape ==> Common industry recognized terms describing shapes of light bulbs.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::shortDescr.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::keyFeature.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::manufactur.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::modelNumbe.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::multipackQ.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::countPerPa.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::mainImageU.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::productSec.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::globalBran.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::homeDecorS.walmart_attribute_doc: Home Decor Style ==> Describes home furnishings and decorations according to various themes, styles and tastes.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::brightness.walmart_attribute_doc: Brightness ==> Brightness per bulb measured in lumens.
Brightness ==> Brightness per bulb measured in lumens.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::assembledP.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::variantGro.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::variantAtt.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::isPrimaryV.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::isProp65Wa.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::prop65Warn.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::batteryTec.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::batteryTec.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::hasWarrant.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::warrantyUR.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::warrantyTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::hasFuelCon.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::finish.walmart_attribute_doc: Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::isEnergySt.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Energy Star-Certified ==> Indicate Y if the product has been certified by the EPA Energy Star program.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::maximumEne.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Energy Surge Rating ==> The maximum amount of energy that a device such as a surge protector can absorb before it fails; measured in joules.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::estimatedE.walmart_attribute_doc: Estimated Energy Cost Per Year ==> The estimated cost per year, based on 3 hrs/day, 11 cents/kWh.
Estimated Energy Cost Per Year ==> The estimated cost per year, based on 3 hrs/day, 11 cents/kWh.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::volts\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: Volts ==> Number of volts the product produces or requires. The significance of voltage varies with type of product. For example, if product is an appliance, used to describe the outlet voltage required. If an item (such as a power supply) both produces and requires different voltages, each type of voltage should be included.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::volts\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: Volts ==> Number of volts the product produces or requires. The significance of voltage varies with type of product. For example, if product is an appliance, used to describe the outlet voltage required. If an item (such as a power supply) both produces and requires different voltages, each type of voltage should be included.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::amps\/meas.walmart_attribute_doc: Amps ==> Number of amps as a measure of electrical current draw. For products such as appliances, amps are usually specified as a peak value to help consumers select items that not overload household circuits. Also used as a measure of capacity (trip level) for electrical products such as circuit breakers and fuses

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::amps\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Amps ==> Number of amps as a measure of electrical current draw. For products such as appliances, amps are usually specified as a peak value to help consumers select items that not overload household circuits. Also used as a measure of capacity (trip level) for electrical products such as circuit breakers and fuses

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::watts\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: Watts ==> Number of watts (wattage) of electrical power the product produces or consumes. This attribute is used in a wide variety of products including appliances, light bulbs, electronic equipment and electrical components.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::watts\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: Watts ==> Number of watts (wattage) of electrical power the product produces or consumes. This attribute is used in a wide variety of products including appliances, light bulbs, electronic equipment and electrical components.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::lightBulbC.walmart_attribute_doc: Light Bulb Color ==> Color of the bulb, if it needs to be differentiated from a standard light bulb.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::numberOfLi.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Lights ==> Number of lights included in an electrical, home decor, or seasonal decoration.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::shadeMater.walmart_attribute_doc: Shade Material ==> The material of a lampshade, to distinguish it from the rest of the lamp or other lighting product

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::shadeStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Shade Style ==> Descriptive term for the shape of a lamp or other lighting product. Many terms are industry standard.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::accessorie.walmart_attribute_doc: Accessories Included ==> Listing of any supplementary items that come with the product. Important information for consumers because accessories typically provide additional convenience, utility, attractiveness or safety to or for a product.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::colorCateg.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::baseColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Base Color ==> Color of the base portion of the item, if it needs to be distinguished from other components.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::baseFinish.walmart_attribute_doc: Base Finish ==> The finish of a base component of an item, if it needs to be distinguished from another component.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::isWaterpro.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::isFireResi.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Fire-Resistant ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to resist burning under certain conditions, as specified by the manufacturer. An important feature for products such as fire blankets, building materials, and safes.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::cleaningCa.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::recommende.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::impedance\.walmart_attribute_doc: Impedance ==> Measurement in Ohms, of the electrical resistance a circuit presents to a current when a voltage is applied. Important characteristic for products such as transmitters, speakers, microphones, and headphones because it restricts ("impedes") the flow of power from the receiver or amplifier.

Impedance ==> Measurement in Ohms, of the electrical resistance a circuit presents to a current when a voltage is applied. Important characteristic for products such as transmitters, speakers, microphones, and headphones because it restricts ("impedes") the flow of power from the receiver or amplifier.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::conductorM.walmart_attribute_doc: Conductor Material ==> A substance that conducts electrical current very easily.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::lightBulbB.walmart_attribute_doc: Light Bulb Base Code ==> Designation that corresponds to the method and size of attachment used to connect the light bulb to the lamp. Important criteria to help consumers select bulbs that will fit their lighting fixtures and devices. For example, the E12 is an Edison screw-mount “candelabra” base, with a 12 mm diameter base and is used for many night lights.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::electrical.walmart_attribute_doc: Electrical Ballast Factor ==> The ratio of the lumen output of a lamp to the lumen output of the same lamp connected to a reference ballast as per ANSI test procedures and as specified by the manufacturer of the lamp. Measures the relationship between the ballast, which is designed to limit the amount of current in the electrical circuit, and the lamp.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::beamAngle\.walmart_attribute_doc: Beam Angle ==> The angle that corresponds to point at which the intensity of a source drops to 50% of maximum (center reading) measured in degrees of the full angle. Used as a component of light performance in products such as headlights and security lights.

Beam Angle ==> The angle that corresponds to point at which the intensity of a source drops to 50% of maximum (center reading) measured in degrees of the full angle. Used as a component of light performance in products such as headlights and security lights.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::beamSpread.walmart_attribute_doc: Beam Spread ==> Measurement of the spread of light from a reflectorized light source. The width of the beam spread is typically specified by the manufacturer for a certain beam angle, as measured from a given distance. For example, a light with a beam angle of 20 degrees that has a 1.8 foot beam spread from 5 feet away. Feature used by consumers as an indicator of performance for products such as headlights and security lights.

Beam Spread ==> Measurement of the spread of light from a reflectorized light source. The width of the beam spread is typically specified by the manufacturer for a certain beam angle, as measured from a given distance. For example, a light with a beam angle of 20 degrees that has a 1.8 foot beam spread from 5 feet away. Feature used by consumers as an indicator of performance for products such as headlights and security lights.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::horsepower.walmart_attribute_doc: Horsepower ==> Measurement of the power of the device. Significance of horsepower varies with type of product. For example, for products with engines, horsepower is a general indicator of an engine's size and power (along with other engine specifications of engine displacement and torque). Horsepower is also used as common rating on electric motors and products that contain them.

Horsepower ==> Measurement of the power of the device. Significance of horsepower varies with type of product. For example, for products with engines, horsepower is a general indicator of an engine's size and power (along with other engine specifications of engine displacement and torque). Horsepower is also used as common rating on electric motors and products that contain them.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::isDarkSkyC.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Dark Sky-Compliant ==> Y indicates that the item has been certified by the International Dark-Sky Association and incorporates features to reduce light pollution (which reduces the number of stars visible at night), and energy consumption. For example, dark sky compliant lights minimize glare and direct light down. For more information, go to http://darksky.org/fsa/.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::colorTempe.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Temperature ==> Light color is measured on a temperature scale referred to as Kelvin (K).
Color Temperature ==> Light color is measured on a temperature scale referred to as Kelvin (K).

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::decibelRat.walmart_attribute_doc: Decibel Rating ==> Measurement, expressed as decibels, of the intensity of sound volume a device produces. Important selection criteria for consumers concerned with effects of products that generate loud noise levels. Attribute applied to such products as power tools and security alarms.

Decibel Rating ==> Measurement, expressed as decibels, of the intensity of sound volume a device produces. Important selection criteria for consumers concerned with effects of products that generate loud noise levels. Attribute applied to such products as power tools and security alarms.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::maximumRan.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Range ==> Measurement of the maximum area a device can accommodate. Attribute applied to products such as light, motion, and sound sensors.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::numberOfGa.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Gangs ==> Number of individual electrical components that can fit in this product. If product is a light switch, refers to the number of rows of switches on the same base-plate.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::numberOfPo.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Poles ==> The number of poles contained in electrical distribution equipment. For example, residential circuit breakers can be single or double-pole

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::responseTi.walmart_attribute_doc: Response Time ==> The amount of time the pixels in the display take to change from one state to another. Measured in milliseconds.
Response Time ==> The amount of time the pixels in the display take to change from one state to another. Measured in milliseconds.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::americanWi.walmart_attribute_doc: American Wire Gauge ==> Measurement of how large a wire is, either in diameter or cross sectional area. Applicable to both electrical non-electrical wires, and to structural cable. Used to indicate electrical characteristics or strength. Measurement is expressed using American wire gauge (AWG) standard. As the wire gauge number increases, the wire diameter decreases. AWG of 12 is a smaller diameter than AWG of 6.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::mountType.walmart_attribute_doc: Mount Type ==> How the item is attached. Used for products such as shelving and fixture hardware.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::isRatedFor.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Rated for Outdoor Use ==> Y indicates the item has been specifically rated by the manufacture for outdoor use. Used for products that also have indoor versions. For electrical equipment, suitability for outdoor use is often related to its IP (Ingress Protection) rating.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::lifespan.walmart_attribute_doc: Lifespan ==> Amount of time the product is expected to last, as specified by the manufacturer. Important selection criteria for comparing products such as light bulbs.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::sportsLeag.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

ToolsAndHardware\/Electrical::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

ToolsAndHardware\/Hardware::shortDescrip.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

ToolsAndHardware\/PlumbingAndHVAC::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. ToolsAndHardware\/PlumbingAndHVAC::manuf.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

ToolsAndHardware\/PlumbingAndHVAC::model.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

ToolsAndHardware\/PlumbingAndHVAC::multi.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

ToolsAndHardware\/PlumbingAndHVAC::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

ToolsAndHardware\/PlumbingAndHVAC::piece.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.
