ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::productSecondar.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::globalBrandLice.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::fuelType.walmart_attribute_doc: Fuel Type ==> The kind of material that a product consumes to produce heat or power. Attribute is also used to classify a fuel product.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::bladeDiameter\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Blade Diameter ==> The measure of the blade at the widest point. For circular blades, measured from the furthest edge of one tip to the furthest edge of the tip directly opposite. Important selection criteria for consumers for compatibility and use. For example, handheld circular saws accept blades that range from 4 ½ - 7 ¼ inches in diameter.

Blade Diameter ==> The measure of the blade at the widest point. For circular blades, measured from the furthest edge of one tip to the furthest edge of the tip directly opposite. Important selection criteria for consumers for compatibility and use. For example, handheld circular saws accept blades that range from 4 ½ - 7 ¼ inches in diameter.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::bladeLength\/me.walmart_attribute_doc: Blade Length ==> The measurement of the length of the blade from the tip to base. For most knives the base would be the forward-most aspect of the handle. Used for products such as knives, scissors, and planers.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::bladeLength\/un.walmart_attribute_doc: Blade Length ==> The measurement of the length of the blade from the tip to base. For most knives the base would be the forward-most aspect of the handle. Used for products such as knives, scissors, and planers.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::bladeShank.walmart_attribute_doc: Blade Shank ==> The type of design of the base of a blade used to attach the blade. Important selection criteria for compatibility between blades and tools. For example, some jigsaws are designed to accept two or more blade shank styles, while others can only accept one style.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::shankSize\/meas.walmart_attribute_doc: Shank Size ==> Overall dimensions of the end piece or shaft portion of the item. In the case of tools, used to select items based on fit. Specific expression of shank size varies with item. For example, for twist drill bits, shank size is the diameter of the shank designed to fit in the chuck of a drill

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::shankSize\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Shank Size ==> Overall dimensions of the end piece or shaft portion of the item. In the case of tools, used to select items based on fit. Specific expression of shank size varies with item. For example, for twist drill bits, shank size is the diameter of the shank designed to fit in the chuck of a drill

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::chuckType.walmart_attribute_doc: Chuck Type ==> The industry term that describes the design of the part of the device that holds the bit. Certain chuck types can be adjusted to accommodate different sizes of bits.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::chuckSize\/meas.walmart_attribute_doc: Chuck Size ==> The measurement of the part of the device that holds the bit and indicates the maximum diameter bit shank that fits the device. Products that have chucks include power drills, lathes, and scroll saws.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::chuckSize\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Chuck Size ==> The measurement of the part of the device that holds the bit and indicates the maximum diameter bit shank that fits the device. Products that have chucks include power drills, lathes, and scroll saws.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::arborDiameter\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Arbor Diameter ==> Measurement of the diameter of shaft or spindle that inserts into and holds an attachment such as a saw blade or grinder wheel. As applied machine tool attachments, describes the arbor hole size and is used to identify machine/attachment fit. For example, a table saw that has a 5/8 inch arbor would accommodate a saw blade with a 5/8 inch arbor opening.

Arbor Diameter ==> Measurement of the diameter of shaft or spindle that inserts into and holds an attachment such as a saw blade or grinder wheel. As applied machine tool attachments, describes the arbor hole size and is used to identify machine/attachment fit. For example, a table saw that has a 5/8 inch arbor would accommodate a saw blade with a 5/8 inch arbor opening.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::colletSize\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: Collet Size ==> The size of the opening of the collar of the collet, which is designed to hold a tool attachment. Collets are commonly found on wood routers, precision grinders and lathes. Attribute also important in selecting compatible tool attachments.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::colletSize\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: Collet Size ==> The size of the opening of the collar of the collet, which is designed to hold a tool attachment. Collets are commonly found on wood routers, precision grinders and lathes. Attribute also important in selecting compatible tool attachments.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::spindleThread.walmart_attribute_doc: Spindle Thread ==> For tools that have spindles, the design and sizing specifications. For example, the thread measurement of the chuck backplate adapter.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::discSize\/measu.walmart_attribute_doc: Disc Size ==> Measurement of the diameter of the disc portion of a tool attachment. Typically used to describe sanding discs and attachments for power tools.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::discSize\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Disc Size ==> Measurement of the diameter of the disc portion of a tool attachment. Typically used to describe sanding discs and attachments for power tools.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::sandingBeltSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Sanding Belt Size ==> The measurement of the width and length of a sandpaper belt. Used to select the correct size to fit a specific belt sander.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::airInlet\/measu.walmart_attribute_doc: Air Inlet ==> Measurement of the diameter of the air intake aperture, measured at its widest point. Attribute used for tools such as air inlet hoses, air impact wrenches, and air compressors.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::airInlet\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Air Inlet ==> Measurement of the diameter of the air intake aperture, measured at its widest point. Attribute used for tools such as air inlet hoses, air impact wrenches, and air compressors.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::averageAirConsu.walmart_attribute_doc: Average Air Consumption @ 90 PSI ==> Rate of airflow the product requires at the given pressure of 90 pounds per square inch. Used for products such as air brushes, framing nailers, and jackhammers. Important criteria that allows consumers to select items that are compatible with their air-delivery system. For example, a ½ʺ impact wrench typically requires 5 CFM at 90 psi.

Average Air Consumption @ 90 PSI ==> Rate of airflow the product requires at the given pressure of 90 pounds per square inch. Used for products such as air brushes, framing nailers, and jackhammers. Important criteria that allows consumers to select items that are compatible with their air-delivery system. For example, a ½ʺ impact wrench typically requires 5 CFM at 90 psi.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::cfmAt40Psi\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: CFM @ 40 PSI ==> The flow rate produced by the item. Expressed in cubic feet per minute, as measured at the pressure of 40 pounds per inch. Allows consumers to select products such as air compressors to accommodate specific tools and applications.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::cfmAt40Psi\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: CFM @ 40 PSI ==> The flow rate produced by the item. Expressed in cubic feet per minute, as measured at the pressure of 40 pounds per inch. Allows consumers to select products such as air compressors to accommodate specific tools and applications.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::cfmAt90Psi\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: CFM @ 90 PSI ==> The airflow rate produced by the item. Expressed in cubic feet per minute, as measured at the pressure of 90 pounds per inch. Allows consumers to select products such as air compressors to accommodate specific tools and applications.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::cfmAt90Psi\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: CFM @ 90 PSI ==> The airflow rate produced by the item. Expressed in cubic feet per minute, as measured at the pressure of 90 pounds per inch. Allows consumers to select products such as air compressors to accommodate specific tools and applications.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::volts\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Volts ==> Number of volts the product produces or requires. The significance of voltage varies with type of product. For example, if product is an appliance, used to describe the outlet voltage required. If an item (such as a power supply) both produces and requires different voltages, each type of voltage should be included.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::volts\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Volts ==> Number of volts the product produces or requires. The significance of voltage varies with type of product. For example, if product is an appliance, used to describe the outlet voltage required. If an item (such as a power supply) both produces and requires different voltages, each type of voltage should be included.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::amps\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Amps ==> Number of amps as a measure of electrical current draw. For products such as appliances, amps are usually specified as a peak value to help consumers select items that not overload household circuits. Also used as a measure of capacity (trip level) for electrical products such as circuit breakers and fuses

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::amps\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Amps ==> Number of amps as a measure of electrical current draw. For products such as appliances, amps are usually specified as a peak value to help consumers select items that not overload household circuits. Also used as a measure of capacity (trip level) for electrical products such as circuit breakers and fuses

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::assembledProduc.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::variantAttribut.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::isPrimaryVarian.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::isProp65Warning.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::prop65WarningTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::batteryTechnolo.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::batteryTechnolo.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::hasFuelContaine.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::accessoriesIncl.walmart_attribute_doc: Accessories Included ==> Listing of any supplementary items that come with the product. Important information for consumers because accessories typically provide additional convenience, utility, attractiveness or safety to or for a product.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::colorCategory\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::isWaterproof.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::isIndustrial.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Industrial ==> Indicates that an item can be used in an industrial setting or has an industrial application.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::isFireResistant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Fire-Resistant ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to resist burning under certain conditions, as specified by the manufacturer. An important feature for products such as fire blankets, building materials, and safes.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::cleaningCareAnd.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::recommendedUses.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::numberOfBlades.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Blades ==> Number of blades in a multi-tool or fan.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::bladeWidth.walmart_attribute_doc: Blade Width ==> The width of a blade of a cutting or wiping tool (saws, squeegees). How the measurement is taken can vary with the product.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::lightBulbType.walmart_attribute_doc: Light Bulb Type ==> Category of light bulb based on method to produce the light. Important to consumers because each type has different characteristics including bulb life, energy efficiency and color temperature. For example LED bulbs have a greater bulb life than equivalent incandescent bulbs.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::gritSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Grit Size ==> The standard numeric designation of abrasive as provided by the manufacturer. Grit size should be in the format for the applicable standard. For example, “P40” if using the ISOS/FEPA, and “40” if using the CAMI standard. Important factor selection factor for sandpapers and abrasive disks based on indented use. A small number (20 or 40) indicates a coarse grit designed for removing deep gouges and imperfections, while a large number (250) indicates a fine grit, which is best for smoothing varnished finishes between coats.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::squareDriveSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Square Drive Size ==> Standardized drive size used to hold a socket or other tooling interface.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::socketDepth.walmart_attribute_doc: Socket Depth ==> The internal, usable depth of a socket.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::numberOfSteps.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Steps ==> The number of steps product has as in a ladder.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::numberOfPoints.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Points ==> The number of points within a socket wrench.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::handing.walmart_attribute_doc: Handing ==> The primary, or dominant hand for which the device is designed. Example products include left-handed scissors and circular power saws.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::finish.walmart_attribute_doc: Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::cordLength\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: Cord Length ==> Measurement of the length of cord that comes with the item. For electrical appliances the cord is typically a power cord. For other products, headphones for example, the cord would connect to the receiver.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::cordLength\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: Cord Length ==> Measurement of the length of cord that comes with the item. For electrical appliances the cord is typically a power cord. For other products, headphones for example, the cord would connect to the receiver.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::batteryCapacity.walmart_attribute_doc: Battery Capacity ==> The measure of the current a battery can deliver over time, expressed in ampere-hours (Ah).
Battery Capacity ==> The measure of the current a battery can deliver over time, expressed in ampere-hours (Ah).

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::engineDisplacem.walmart_attribute_doc: Engine Displacement ==> The combined volume, as displaced by the pistons for all cylinders of an internal combustion engine. Generally expressed in cubic centimeters up to 1000 cc, and liters thereafter, or in cubic inches. Engine displacement is often used as a rough indicator of an engine's power and potential fuel consumption.

Engine Displacement ==> The combined volume, as displaced by the pistons for all cylinders of an internal combustion engine. Generally expressed in cubic centimeters up to 1000 cc, and liters thereafter, or in cubic inches. Engine displacement is often used as a rough indicator of an engine's power and potential fuel consumption.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::horsepower\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: Horsepower ==> Measurement of the power of the device. Significance of horsepower varies with type of product. For example, for products with engines, horsepower is a general indicator of an engine's size and power (along with other engine specifications of engine displacement and torque). Horsepower is also used as common rating on electric motors and products that contain them.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::horsepower\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: Horsepower ==> Measurement of the power of the device. Significance of horsepower varies with type of product. For example, for products with engines, horsepower is a general indicator of an engine's size and power (along with other engine specifications of engine displacement and torque). Horsepower is also used as common rating on electric motors and products that contain them.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::decibelRating\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Decibel Rating ==> Measurement, expressed as decibels, of the intensity of sound volume a device produces. Important selection criteria for consumers concerned with effects of products that generate loud noise levels. Attribute applied to such products as power tools and security alarms.

Decibel Rating ==> Measurement, expressed as decibels, of the intensity of sound volume a device produces. Important selection criteria for consumers concerned with effects of products that generate loud noise levels. Attribute applied to such products as power tools and security alarms.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::maximumAirPress.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Pressure ==> The maximum internal pressure that the product is designed to contain and/or control.
Maximum Pressure ==> The maximum internal pressure that the product is designed to contain and/or control.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::maximumWattsOut.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Watts Out ==> Overall power rating as specified by the manufacturer, expressed as MWO. Used primarily for power tools.
Maximum Watts Out ==> Overall power rating as specified by the manufacturer, expressed as MWO. Used primarily for power tools.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::torque.walmart_attribute_doc: Torque ==> Measurement of turning or twisting force as measured in foot pounds (ft-lbs). Significance varies with product. For example, for torque wrenches, torque value helps consumers select the correct torque wrench for tightening a specific nut or bolt. If item has an engine, torque is a general indicator of an engine's pulling power.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::sandingSpeed\/m.walmart_attribute_doc: Sanding Speed ==> Speed of the sander expressed in orbits per minute or surface feet per minute.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::sandingSpeed\/u.walmart_attribute_doc: Sanding Speed ==> Speed of the sander expressed in orbits per minute or surface feet per minute.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::noLoadSpeed\/me.walmart_attribute_doc: No Load Speed ==> The maximum speed the product can reach without a load. For example, the maximum speed, expressed in rpm, a cordless drill driver can reach when it's not driving screws or drilling holes.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::noLoadSpeed\/un.walmart_attribute_doc: No Load Speed ==> The maximum speed the product can reach without a load. For example, the maximum speed, expressed in rpm, a cordless drill driver can reach when it's not driving screws or drilling holes.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::strokeLength\/m.walmart_attribute_doc: Stroke Length ==> Measurement describing how far a component travels in one direction in each movement cycle. When applied to power tools, allows selection based on intended use. For example, for reciprocating saws, a shorter stroke length allows for better control in tight areas, while a longer stroke length provides more aggressive cutting action for heavy demolition.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::strokeLength\/u.walmart_attribute_doc: Stroke Length ==> Measurement describing how far a component travels in one direction in each movement cycle. When applied to power tools, allows selection based on intended use. For example, for reciprocating saws, a shorter stroke length allows for better control in tight areas, while a longer stroke length provides more aggressive cutting action for heavy demolition.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::strokesPerMinut.walmart_attribute_doc: Strokes Per Minute ==> Number of stokes per minute. Attribute typically applied to power tools as a measure of speed, and allows selection based on intended use. For example, for jig saws, deep cuts in dense hardwoods require high speed, while hard steel demands much slower blade stokes per minute.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::blowsPerMinute.walmart_attribute_doc: Blows Per Minute ==> The number of blows per minute a tool, such as a hammer drill, is able to produce.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::impactEnergy\/m.walmart_attribute_doc: Impact Energy ==> Measurement of force applied by the item, expressed in joules. Used as selection factor for tools such as impact wrenches.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::impactEnergy\/u.walmart_attribute_doc: Impact Energy ==> Measurement of force applied by the item, expressed in joules. Used as selection factor for tools such as impact wrenches.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::loadCapacity\/m.walmart_attribute_doc: Load Capacity ==> The maximum load, expressed in psi, that the product is designed to have applied to it.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::loadCapacity\/u.walmart_attribute_doc: Load Capacity ==> The maximum load, expressed in psi, that the product is designed to have applied to it.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::volumeCapacity\.walmart_attribute_doc: Volume Capacity ==> The volume of space available in this item to contain objects.
Volume Capacity ==> The volume of space available in this item to contain objects.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::teethPerInch.walmart_attribute_doc: Teeth Per Inch ==> Number of teeth per inch of the item. Important selection factor for saw blades. For example, more TPI gives a smoother cut but requires a slower saw cut, fewer TPI allows a faster cut with a slightly rougher finish.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::maximumJawOpeni.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Jaw Opening ==> Measurement of the widest opening with the jaw of the product in its widest position. Typically used for tools such as an adjustable wrench, or vise.
Maximum Jaw Opening ==> Measurement of the widest opening with the jaw of the product in its widest position. Typically used for tools such as an adjustable wrench, or vise.

ToolsAndHardware\/Tools::tankConfigurati.walmart_attribute_doc: Tank Configuration ==> The type of arrangement of supply tanks associated with a tool such as an air compressor.

ToolsAndHardware\/ToolsAndHardwareOther:.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.
Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.
Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.
Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.
Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
ToolsAndHardware\/ToolsAndHardwareOther:.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

ToolsAndHardware\/ToolsAndHardwareOther:.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.
Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

Accessories Included ==> Listing of any supplementary items that come with the product. Important information for consumers because accessories typically provide additional convenience, utility, attractiveness or safety to or for a product.
Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.
Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

Is Fire-Resistant ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to resist burning under certain conditions, as specified by the manufacturer. An important feature for products such as fire blankets, building materials, and safes.
Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.
Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.
Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.
Swatch Variant Attribute ==> Conditionally Required
Swatch Image URL ==> Conditionally Required

If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Home\/Bedding::requiresTextileActLabelin.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Home\/Bedding::countryOfOriginTextiles.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

Home\/LargeAppliances::variantAttributeN.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Home\/LargeAppliances::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Home\/LargeAppliances::isProp65WarningRe.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Home\/LargeAppliances::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Home\/LargeAppliances::batteryTechnology.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Home\/LargeAppliances::batteryTechnology.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Home\/LargeAppliances::hasCfl.walmart_attribute_doc: Has CFL ==> Indicates if any part of the item is or has a compact fluorescent light bulb.

Home\/LargeAppliances::isLightingFactsLa.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Lighting Facts Label Required ==> Does your item require a Lighting Facts label? A Lighting Facts label must appear on packaging for most general service "lamps" with medium screw bases. That includes most incandescent, compact fluorescent (CFL), and light emitting diode (LED) light bulbs. For more information on what items are covered, see 16 CFR § 305.2 and § 305.3.

Home\/LargeAppliances::lightingFactsLabe.walmart_attribute_doc: Lighting Facts Label Image ==> URL of the location of the label. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// Label must include brightness specified lumens, estimated energy cost per year, life, light appearance, scale, energy used, and special handling information needed for disposal, as outlined by the FTC. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Home\/LargeAppliances::isEnergyGuideLabe.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Energy Guide Label Required ==> Denotes whether the label is required for the item. The FTC’s Appliance Labeling Rule requires retailers to display energy cost information for certain refrigerators, freezers, furnaces, televisions, clothes washers, dishwashers, water heaters, pool heaters, and room air conditioners. The Rule also covers labeling for plumbing products and ceiling fans. For more information, see 16 CFR part 305.

Home\/LargeAppliances::energyGuideLabel.walmart_attribute_doc: Energy Guide Label ==> Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no query parameters. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. Recommended image resolution: 2000 pixels on longest side at 72 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: 500 pixels on longest side.

Home\/LargeAppliances::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Home\/LargeAppliances::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Home\/LargeAppliances::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Home\/LargeAppliances::isAssemblyRequire.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Assembly Required ==> Is product unassembled and must be put together before use?

Home\/LargeAppliances::assemblyInstructi.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembly Instructions ==> Provide a URL to an image or PDF asset showing assembly instructions for items requiring assembly. URLs must be static and have no query parameters. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// and should end in in the file name.

Home\/LargeAppliances::cleaningCareAndMa.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

Home\/LargeAppliances::recommendedUses.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

Home\/LargeAppliances::recommendedRooms.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Rooms ==> The rooms where the item is likely or recommended to be used.

Home\/LargeAppliances::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

Home\/LargeAppliances::volts\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Volts ==> Number of volts the product produces or requires. The significance of voltage varies with type of product. For example, if product is an appliance, used to describe the outlet voltage required. If an item (such as a power supply) both produces and requires different voltages, each type of voltage should be included.

Home\/LargeAppliances::volts\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Volts ==> Number of volts the product produces or requires. The significance of voltage varies with type of product. For example, if product is an appliance, used to describe the outlet voltage required. If an item (such as a power supply) both produces and requires different voltages, each type of voltage should be included.

Home\/LargeAppliances::watts\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Watts ==> Number of watts (wattage) of electrical power the product produces or consumes. This attribute is used in a wide variety of products including appliances, light bulbs, electronic equipment and electrical components.

Home\/LargeAppliances::watts\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Watts ==> Number of watts (wattage) of electrical power the product produces or consumes. This attribute is used in a wide variety of products including appliances, light bulbs, electronic equipment and electrical components.

Home\/LargeAppliances::btu.walmart_attribute_doc: BTU ==> Indicates British thermal units for heating and cooling appliances.

Home\/LargeAppliances::isRemoteControlIn.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Remote Control Included ==> Is a remote control included with the item?

Home\/LargeAppliances::cordLength\/measu.walmart_attribute_doc: Cord Length ==> Measurement of the length of cord that comes with the item. For electrical appliances the cord is typically a power cord. For other products, headphones for example, the cord would connect to the receiver.

Home\/LargeAppliances::cordLength\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Cord Length ==> Measurement of the length of cord that comes with the item. For electrical appliances the cord is typically a power cord. For other products, headphones for example, the cord would connect to the receiver.

Home\/LargeAppliances::maximumRoomSize\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Room Size ==> Indicates the maximum room size that can be comfortably climate controlled for climate-control appliances. Measured in square feet.
Maximum Room Size ==> Indicates the maximum room size that can be comfortably climate controlled for climate-control appliances. Measured in square feet.

Home\/LargeAppliances::fuelType.walmart_attribute_doc: Fuel Type ==> The kind of material that a product consumes to produce heat or power. Attribute is also used to classify a fuel product.

Home\/LargeAppliances::isSmart.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Smart ==> Indicates whether a device is among the set of "smart" appliances (indicating Web, wireless, or interactive technology has been integrated into device functionality).

Home\/LargeAppliances::runTime\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Run Time ==> Indicates how long humidifying appliances will run with one tank fill, measured in hours.

Home\/LargeAppliances::runTime\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Run Time ==> Indicates how long humidifying appliances will run with one tank fill, measured in hours.

Home\/LargeAppliances::hasAutomaticShuto.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Automatic Shutoff ==> Y indicates the item has a mechanism that automatically shuts off the device or shuts off flow to the device. This is important to consumers to conserve resources or as a safety feature. It is used for a variety of products including hoses, appliances and gas grills.

Home\/LargeAppliances::loadPosition.walmart_attribute_doc: Load Position ==> Indicates whether washing machines and dryers are top load or front load.

Home\/LargeAppliances::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

Home\/LargeAppliances::collection.walmart_attribute_doc: Collection ==> A collection is a particular group of items that have the same visual style, made by the same brand.

Home\/LargeAppliances::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Home\/LargeAppliances::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Home\/HomeOther::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Home\/HomeOther::keyFeatures/keyFeatures.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Home\/HomeOther::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Home\/HomeOther::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Home\/HomeOther::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Home\/HomeOther::manufacturerPartNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Home\/HomeOther::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Home\/HomeOther::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Home\/HomeOther::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Home\/HomeOther::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Home\/HomeOther::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Home\/HomeOther::productSecondaryImageUR.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Home\/HomeOther::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Home\/HomeOther::colorCategory\/colorCat.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Home\/HomeOther::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Home\/HomeOther::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

Home\/HomeOther::finish.walmart_attribute_doc: Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.

Home\/HomeOther::ageGroup\/ageGroupValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

Home\/HomeOther::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

Home\/HomeOther::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

Home\/HomeOther::threadCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Thread Count ==> The number of horizontal and vertical threads per square inch of fabric. This is considered an important indicator of item quality. For example, when selecting bed sheets, consumers correlate higher thread counts (over 300) with better quality and comfort.

Home\/HomeOther::rugSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Rug Size ==> The approximate size of rugs and rug runners, measured in feet, and and expressed as Length x Width (for example: a ten-foot-long by five-foot-wide rug's measurements should be entered as 10 x 5).

Home\/HomeOther::rugStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Rug Style ==> Style of rug expressed in fashion or form. Use the example values; if your style does not appear, you may enter it.

Home\/HomeOther::curtainPanelStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Curtain Panel Style ==> Type of design for panel curtains typically based on method of attachment. Attribute is used on the front end to display panel types to customers. For example, some customers prefer a grommet style panel because it slides easily onto a rod or pole.

Home\/HomeOther::scent.walmart_attribute_doc: Scent ==> Descriptive term for fragrance labeled on the product, if any. "Unscented" is a scent, if labeled. If no scent is specifically labeled, leave blank.

Home\/HomeOther::isPetFriendly.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Pet Friendly ==> Y indicates the item has special features that are contusive to pet well-being, or living with a pet. Used for home products that are a good choice if you have pets. For example, if a chair cushion is made of fabric that's designed to resistant to stains, smells, bacteria and muddy paws.

Home\/HomeOther::fillMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Fill Material ==> The material used to stuff the item (in a cushion or plush toy, for example).

Home\/HomeOther::clockNumberType.walmart_attribute_doc: Clock Number Type ==> The type of numbers on a clock or watch. Some consumers find Arabic numbers easier to read than Roman numerals. Others prefer the clean look of a clock with no numbers.

Home\/HomeOther::homeDecorStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Home Decor Style ==> Describes home furnishings and decorations according to various themes, styles and tastes.

Home\/HomeOther::diameter\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.

Home\/HomeOther::diameter\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.

Home\/HomeOther::theme.walmart_attribute_doc: Theme ==> A dominant idea, meaning, or setting applied to an item. Used in a wide range of products including decorative objects, clothing, toys, and furniture. Can be an important selection criteria for consumers who want to achieve a particular ambiance for room décor or for a special occasion.

Home\/HomeOther::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

Home\/HomeOther::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Home\/HomeOther::assembledProductLength\.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Home\/HomeOther::assembledProductWidth\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Home\/HomeOther::assembledProductHeight\.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Home\/HomeOther::assembledProductWeight\.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Home\/HomeOther::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Home\/HomeOther::variantAttributeNames\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Home\/HomeOther::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Home\/HomeOther::isProp65WarningRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Home\/HomeOther::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Home\/HomeOther::smallPartsWarnings\/sma.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Home\/HomeOther::requiresTextileActLabel.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Home\/HomeOther::countryOfOriginTextiles.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

Home\/HomeOther::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Home\/HomeOther::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Home\/HomeOther::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Home\/HomeOther::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Home\/HomeOther::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Home\/HomeOther::compositeWoodCertificat.walmart_attribute_doc: Composite Wood Certification Code ==> Composite Wood - Indicates if any portion of the item contains any of the following types of composite wood: hardwood plywood veneer core, hardwood plywood composite core, particleboard, or medium density fiber board (MDF). Enter the code corresponding to the highest formaldehyde emission level on any portion of the item. Code Definitions: 1 - Does not contain composite wood; 7 - Product is not CARB compliant and cannot be sold in California; 8 - Product is CARB compliant and can be sold in California.

Home\/HomeOther::hasFuelContainer.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

Home\/HomeOther::isLightingFactsLabelReq.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Lighting Facts Label Required ==> Does your item require a Lighting Facts label? A Lighting Facts label must appear on packaging for most general service "lamps" with medium screw bases. That includes most incandescent, compact fluorescent (CFL), and light emitting diode (LED) light bulbs. For more information on what items are covered, see 16 CFR § 305.2 and § 305.3.

Home\/HomeOther::lightingFactsLabel.walmart_attribute_doc: Lighting Facts Label Image ==> URL of the location of the label. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// Label must include brightness specified lumens, estimated energy cost per year, life, light appearance, scale, energy used, and special handling information needed for disposal, as outlined by the FTC. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Home\/HomeOther::isAssemblyRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Assembly Required ==> Is product unassembled and must be put together before use?

Home\/HomeOther::assemblyInstructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembly Instructions ==> Provide a URL to an image or PDF asset showing assembly instructions for items requiring assembly. URLs must be static and have no query parameters. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// and should end in in the file name.

Home\/HomeOther::cleaningCareAndMaintena.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

Home\/HomeOther::contaminantsRemoved.walmart_attribute_doc: Contaminants Removed ==> The particles, liquids, and gases in the air or water which have harmful chemical properties that are removed by the item.

Home\/HomeOther::recommendedUses.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

Home\/HomeOther::recommendedRooms.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Rooms ==> The rooms where the item is likely or recommended to be used.

Home\/HomeOther::fabricContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Home\/HomeOther::fabricColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Color ==> Color of a fabric part of an item, to distinguish it from the general color of the item, if needed.

Home\/HomeOther::fabricCareInstructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

Home\/HomeOther::curtainLength\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Curtain Length ==> Measurement of the length of the curtain as specified by the manufacturer. How length is measured varies with the type of curtain. Most are measured overall from the top edge of the curtain to the bottom edge (longest point) of the curtain. Curtains with large rod pockets are measured from the top of the rod pocket to the bottom edge of the curtain.

Home\/HomeOther::curtainLength\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Curtain Length ==> Measurement of the length of the curtain as specified by the manufacturer. How length is measured varies with the type of curtain. Most are measured overall from the top edge of the curtain to the bottom edge (longest point) of the curtain. Curtains with large rod pockets are measured from the top of the rod pocket to the bottom edge of the curtain.

Home\/HomeOther::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

Home\/HomeOther::volumeCapacity\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Volume Capacity ==> The volume of space available in this item to contain objects.

Home\/HomeOther::volumeCapacity\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Volume Capacity ==> The volume of space available in this item to contain objects.

Home\/HomeOther::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

Home\/HomeOther::occasion.walmart_attribute_doc: Occasion ==> The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product.

Home\/HomeOther::accentColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Accent Color ==> A secondary product color.

Home\/HomeOther::bedStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Bed Style ==> Describes the bed's shape and appearance according to its design features.

Home\/HomeOther::hasPricePerUnit.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Price Per Unit ==> Mark as "Y" if your item is any of the following: food used for human or domestic animal consumption; ingredients added to food; napkins; tissues; toilet paper; foil, plastic wrap, wax paper, parchment paper; paper towels; disposable plates, bowls, and cutlery; detergents, soaps, waxes, and other cleansing agents; non-prescription drugs, female hygeine products, and toiletries; automotive fluids and cleaners; rock salt; diapers, pullups and swimmers; fertilizer; kitty litter.

Home\/HomeOther::pricePerUnitQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Quantity of Units ==> Enter the quantity of units for the item, based on the "PPU Unit of Measure" you selected. For example, a gallon of milk should be 128. NOTE: Do not enter the price.

Home\/HomeOther::pricePerUnitUom.walmart_attribute_doc: Price Per Unit UOM ==> The units that will be used to calculate the "Price Per Unit" for your product. For example, a gallon of milk has a "PPU Unit of Measure" of Fluid Ounces. NOTE: This may not be the Unit of Measure on the label.

Home\/HomeOther::baseColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Base Color ==> Color of the base portion of the item, if it needs to be distinguished from other components.

Home\/HomeOther::baseFinish.walmart_attribute_doc: Base Finish ==> The finish of a base component of an item, if it needs to be distinguished from another component.

Home\/HomeOther::shadeMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Shade Material ==> The material of a lampshade, to distinguish it from the rest of the lamp or other lighting product

Home\/HomeOther::shadeStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Shade Style ==> Descriptive term for the shape of a lamp or other lighting product. Many terms are industry standard.
