Home\/HomeOther::collection.walmart_attribute_doc: Collection ==> A collection is a particular group of items that have the same visual style, made by the same brand.

Home\/HomeOther::serviceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Service Count ==> The number of people that a set of dishes, glasses, flatware, etc. will serve.

Home\/HomeOther::meal.walmart_attribute_doc: Meal ==> A meal that is normally tied to a particular time of day: breakfast, lunch, dinner, tea.

Home\/HomeOther::frameColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Frame Color ==> The color of a frame component of a product, if it needs to be distinguished from other components.

Home\/HomeOther::slatWidth\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Slat Width ==> The width of a slat component of a product, such as widow blinds. This measurement is distinguished from the width of the product itself.

Home\/HomeOther::slatWidth\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Slat Width ==> The width of a slat component of a product, such as widow blinds. This measurement is distinguished from the width of the product itself.

Home\/HomeOther::isSet.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Set ==> Y indicates that the product consists of two or more different items sold together as a set. Example: A bedding set that includes sheets, pillow shams, and a comforter.

Home\/HomeOther::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Home\/HomeOther::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Home\/HomeOther::academicInstitution.walmart_attribute_doc: Academic Institution ==> Name of College or other school. This is to distinguish the school from its sports team.

Home\/HomeOther::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Home\/HomeOther::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Home\/HomeOther::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

ArtAndCraft::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

ArtAndCraft::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesValu.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

ArtAndCraft::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

ArtAndCraft::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

ArtAndCraft::manufacturerPartNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

ArtAndCraft::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

ArtAndCraft::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

ArtAndCraft::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

ArtAndCraft::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

ArtAndCraft::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

ArtAndCraft::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

ArtAndCraft::productSecondaryImageURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

ArtAndCraft::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

ArtAndCraft::colorCategory\/colorCategor.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

ArtAndCraft::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

ArtAndCraft::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

ArtAndCraft::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

ArtAndCraft::metal.walmart_attribute_doc: Metal ==> For items made primarily of metal, or where the metal component plays an important part in the makeup of the item and purchasing decision.

ArtAndCraft::plating.walmart_attribute_doc: Plating ==> Metal plating. Use for items where the plating is a central feature, or important to the buying decision.

ArtAndCraft::finish.walmart_attribute_doc: Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.

ArtAndCraft::form.walmart_attribute_doc: Form ==> Describes the way the item is dispensed or consumed, including its texture or other physical characteristics.

ArtAndCraft::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

ArtAndCraft::scent.walmart_attribute_doc: Scent ==> Descriptive term for fragrance labeled on the product, if any. "Unscented" is a scent, if labeled. If no scent is specifically labeled, leave blank.

ArtAndCraft::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

ArtAndCraft::ageGroup\/ageGroupValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

ArtAndCraft::ageRange.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Range ==> Minimum and Maximum Ages for a product. Note: Both Min. and Max. attributes will be the same Unit of Measure: Months, or Years.

ArtAndCraft::artPaintType.walmart_attribute_doc: Art Paint Type ==> One of the general media for paints: Oil, Acrylic, Watercolor

ArtAndCraft::assembledProductLength\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ArtAndCraft::assembledProductLength\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ArtAndCraft::assembledProductWidth\/meas.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ArtAndCraft::assembledProductWidth\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ArtAndCraft::assembledProductHeight\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ArtAndCraft::assembledProductHeight\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ArtAndCraft::assembledProductWeight\/mea.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ArtAndCraft::assembledProductWeight\/uni.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

ArtAndCraft::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

ArtAndCraft::variantAttributeNames\/vari.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

ArtAndCraft::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

ArtAndCraft::isProp65WarningRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

ArtAndCraft::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

ArtAndCraft::smallPartsWarnings\/smallPa.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

ArtAndCraft::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
ArtAndCraft::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

ArtAndCraft::hasIngredientList.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

ArtAndCraft::ingredientListImage.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

ArtAndCraft::ingredients.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.

ArtAndCraft::isAerosol.walmart_attribute_doc: Contains Aerosol ==> ‘Aerosol’ is defined by Walmart to include any item of Merchandise that contains a compressed gas or propellant (including bag-on-valve and other pressurized designs). If your product meets this definition, Mark Y and ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.

ArtAndCraft::isChemical.walmart_attribute_doc: Contains Chemical ==> ‘Chemical’ is defined by Walmart to include any item of Merchandise that contains a powder, gel, paste, or liquid that is not intended for human consumption. ‘Chemical’ also includes the following types items that ARE intended for human consumption, inhalation, or absorption, or labeled with drug facts: All over-the-counter medications, including: Lozenges, pills or capsules (e.g. pain relievers; allergy medications; as well as vitamins and supplements that contain metals); Medicated swabs and wipes, acne medication, and sunscreen; Medicated patches (such as nicotine patches); Liquids (e.g. cough medicine, medicated drops, nasal spray and inhalers); Medicated shampoos, gums, ointments and creams; Medicated lip balm, lip creams and petroleum jelly; Contraceptive foam, films, and spermicides; and Product/Equipment sold with chemicals (e.g. vaporizer sold with medication) and electronic cigarettes. If your product meets this definition, Mark Y and ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.

ArtAndCraft::compositeWoodCertificationC.walmart_attribute_doc: Composite Wood Certification Code ==> Composite Wood - Indicates if any portion of the item contains any of the following types of composite wood: hardwood plywood veneer core, hardwood plywood composite core, particleboard, or medium density fiber board (MDF). Enter the code corresponding to the highest formaldehyde emission level on any portion of the item. Code Definitions: 1 - Does not contain composite wood; 7 - Product is not CARB compliant and cannot be sold in California; 8 - Product is CARB compliant and can be sold in California.

ArtAndCraft::hasExpiration.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Expiration ==> Select Yes if product is labeled with any type of expiration or code date that indicates when product should no longer be consumed or no longer at best quality (e.g. Best If Used By, Best By, Use By, etc. ). Some examples of items with expiration dates include food, cleaning supplies, beauty products, etc.

ArtAndCraft::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

ArtAndCraft::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

ArtAndCraft::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

ArtAndCraft::hasFuelContainer.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

ArtAndCraft::fabricContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

ArtAndCraft::fabricCareInstructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

ArtAndCraft::capacity.walmart_attribute_doc: Capacity ==> A product's available space. Capacity is often provided for items that contain multiple pieces of something or that can accommodate some number of objects.

ArtAndCraft::diameter\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.

ArtAndCraft::diameter\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.

ArtAndCraft::culturalStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Cultural Style ==> The style of an item, as it relates to a particular people or geographic region.

ArtAndCraft::subject.walmart_attribute_doc: Subject ==> The "aboutness" of an item, distinct from the genre. It may be the subject of a documentary, nonfiction book, or art print.

ArtAndCraft::theme.walmart_attribute_doc: Theme ==> A dominant idea, meaning, or setting applied to an item. Used in a wide range of products including decorative objects, clothing, toys, and furniture. Can be an important selection criteria for consumers who want to achieve a particular ambiance for room décor or for a special occasion.

ArtAndCraft::occasion.walmart_attribute_doc: Occasion ==> The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product.

ArtAndCraft::isAntique.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Antique ==> Is the item a valuable collectable because of its age?

ArtAndCraft::isCollectible.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Collectible ==> Indicates if the item is regarded as being of value or interest to a collector.

ArtAndCraft::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

ArtAndCraft::isPowered.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Powered ==> Y indicates that an item uses electricity, requiring a power cord or batteries to operate. Useful for items that have non-powered equivalents (e.g. toothbrushes).

ArtAndCraft::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

ArtAndCraft::isBulk.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Bulk ==> Intended for weighable or variably 'sized' items where Vendor Pack Quantity (an integer value) is not all that helpful, for things like Fabric or Roving.

ArtAndCraft::isHandmade.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Handmade ==> Y indicates that the item was created/assembled individually by hand. Usually a one of a kind, a hand-crafted product is made without the use of machines and is not mass produced.

ArtAndCraft::isSelfAdhesive.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Self-Adhesive ==> Indicates that the item does not need separate hardware or equipment to attach to a surface.

ArtAndCraft::isAntitarnish.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Antitarnish ==> Indicates that the product was especially formulated to avoid metallic corrosion.

ArtAndCraft::isReusable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Reusable ==> Indicates the item can be used more than once.

ArtAndCraft::isRefillable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Refillable ==> Indicates that the item is available in a container that is intended to be refilled and used again.

ArtAndCraft::isDisposable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Disposable ==> Indicates the item is intended for single use.

ArtAndCraft::isRecyclable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Recyclable ==> Recycle is the act of processing used or abandoned materials for use in creating new products or capable of being used again.

ArtAndCraft::recommendedUses.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

ArtAndCraft::recommendedSurfaces.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Surfaces ==> The surfaces that a product is marketed for, or meant to be compatible with.

ArtAndCraft::chainLength\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Chain Length ==> Enter length of jewelry chain, in inches or feet.

ArtAndCraft::chainLength\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Chain Length ==> Enter length of jewelry chain, in inches or feet.

ArtAndCraft::skillLevel.walmart_attribute_doc: Skill Level ==> Is the product marketed or intended to be used by someone with a particular background or skill level?

ArtAndCraft::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

ArtAndCraft::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

ArtAndCraft::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Baby\/BabyFood::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Baby\/BabyFood::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesV.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Baby\/BabyFood::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Baby\/BabyFood::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Baby\/BabyFood::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Baby\/BabyFood::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Baby\/BabyFood::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Baby\/BabyFood::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Baby\/BabyFood::productSecondaryImageURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Baby\/BabyFood::flavor.walmart_attribute_doc: Flavor ==> The distinctive taste or flavor of the item, as provided by manufacturer. This is used for a wide variety of products, including food and beverages for both animals and humans. This may also apply to non-food items that come in flavors, including dental products, cigars and smoker wood chips.

Baby\/BabyFood::meal.walmart_attribute_doc: Meal ==> A meal that is normally tied to a particular time of day: breakfast, lunch, dinner, tea.

Baby\/BabyFood::isReadyToEat.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Ready-to-Eat ==> Food that can be consumed without further preparation, according to FDA guidelines. For more information see FDA Food Code 2009: Chapter 1-201.10 Definitions.

Baby\/BabyFood::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

Baby\/BabyFood::ageGroup\/ageGroupValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

Baby\/BabyFood::ageRange.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Range ==> Minimum and Maximum Ages for a product. Note: Both Min. and Max. attributes will be the same Unit of Measure: Months, or Years.

Baby\/BabyFood::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

Baby\/BabyFood::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Baby\/BabyFood::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Baby\/BabyFood::variantAttributeNames\/v.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Baby\/BabyFood::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Baby\/BabyFood::isProp65WarningRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Baby\/BabyFood::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Baby\/BabyFood::hasPricePerUnit.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Price Per Unit ==> Mark as "Y" if your item is any of the following: food used for human or domestic animal consumption; ingredients added to food; napkins; tissues; toilet paper; foil, plastic wrap, wax paper, parchment paper; paper towels; disposable plates, bowls, and cutlery; detergents, soaps, waxes, and other cleansing agents; non-prescription drugs, female hygeine products, and toiletries; automotive fluids and cleaners; rock salt; diapers, pullups and swimmers; fertilizer; kitty litter.

Baby\/BabyFood::pricePerUnitQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Quantity of Units ==> Enter the quantity of units for the item, based on the "PPU Unit of Measure" you selected. For example, a gallon of milk should be 128. NOTE: Do not enter the price.

Baby\/BabyFood::pricePerUnitUom.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Unit of Measure ==> The units that will be used to calculate the "Price Per Unit" for your product. For example, a gallon of milk has a "PPU Unit of Measure" of Fluid Ounces. NOTE: This may not be the Unit of Measure on the label.

Baby\/BabyFood::hasExpiration.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Expiration ==> Select Yes if product is labeled with any type of expiration or code date that indicates when product should no longer be consumed or no longer at best quality (e.g. Best If Used By, Best By, Use By, etc. ). Some examples of items with expiration dates include food, cleaning supplies, beauty products, etc.

Baby\/BabyFood::shelfLife\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Shelf Life ==> The length of time that the product can be stored without becoming unfit for consumption or after which the product is no longer at best quality, measured in days.

Baby\/BabyFood::shelfLife\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Shelf Life ==> The length of time that the product can be stored without becoming unfit for consumption or after which the product is no longer at best quality, measured in days.

Baby\/BabyFood::isNutritionFactsLabelReq.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Nutrition Facts and Ingredient Label Required ==> Indicates if item requires nutritional facts labeling per FDA guidelines. If yes, please provide the following elements in one or more images 1) The Nutrition Facts and 2) Ingredients. Both attributes are required. If both elements are contained in one image, you may repeat the URL in both attributes.

Baby\/BabyFood::nutritionFactsLabel.walmart_attribute_doc: Nutrition Facts Label Image ==> Image URL of the nutritional facts label. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Baby\/BabyFood::nutritionIngredientsImag.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredients Label Image ==> URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Baby\/BabyFood::hasIngredientList.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

Baby\/BabyFood::ingredientListImage.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Baby\/BabyFood::ingredients.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.

Baby\/BabyFood::hasGMOs.walmart_attribute_doc: Has GMOs ==> Does your product contain Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOS) whose DNA has been altered using genetic engineering techniques?

Baby\/BabyFood::servingSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Serving Size ==> Measurement value specifying the amount of the item typically used as a reference on the label of that item to list per serving information (nutrients, calories, total fat). Applicable for a wide variety of products including food, beverages, and nutritional supplements.

Baby\/BabyFood::servingsPerContainer.walmart_attribute_doc: Servings Per Container ==> Number of servings contained in the item's package (box, bottle, bag).

Baby\/BabyFood::calories\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Calories Per Serving ==> Number of calories contained in one serving, as found on the food label.

Baby\/BabyFood::calories\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Calories Per Serving ==> Number of calories contained in one serving, as found on the food label.

Baby\/BabyFood::caloriesFromFat\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Fat Calories Per Serving ==> Number of calories derived from fat, as found on the food label.

Baby\/BabyFood::caloriesFromFat\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Fat Calories Per Serving ==> Number of calories derived from fat, as found on the food label.

Baby\/BabyFood::totalFat\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Fat Per Serving ==> Total number of fat calories per serving, expressed in grams, milligrams, or less than a certain number of grams.

Baby\/BabyFood::totalFat\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Fat Per Serving ==> Total number of fat calories per serving, expressed in grams, milligrams, or less than a certain number of grams.

Baby\/BabyFood::totalFatPercentageDailyV.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Fat Percentage Daily Value ==> Percent daily value of fat per serving, according to the food label.

Baby\/BabyFood::fatCaloriesPerGram\/meas.walmart_attribute_doc: Fat Calories Per Gram ==> The number of calories in one gram of fat, as may be provided in Nutritional Facts according to FDA guidelines.

Baby\/BabyFood::fatCaloriesPerGram\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Fat Calories Per Gram ==> The number of calories in one gram of fat, as may be provided in Nutritional Facts according to FDA guidelines.

Baby\/BabyFood::totalCarbohydrate\/measu.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Carbohydrate ==> Total number of carbohydrates per serving, expressed in grams or less than a certain number of grams.

Baby\/BabyFood::totalCarbohydrate\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Carbohydrate ==> Total number of carbohydrates per serving, expressed in grams or less than a certain number of grams.

Baby\/BabyFood::totalCarbohydratePercent.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Carbohydrate Percentage Daily Value ==> Percent daily value of carbohydrates per serving.

Baby\/BabyFood::carbohydrateCaloriesPerG.walmart_attribute_doc: Carbohydrate Calories Per Gram ==> The number of calories in one gram of carbohydrates, as may be provided in Nutritional Facts according to FDA guidelines.
Carbohydrate Calories Per Gram ==> The number of calories in one gram of carbohydrates, as may be provided in Nutritional Facts according to FDA guidelines.

Baby\/BabyFood::nutrients.walmart_attribute_doc: Nutrients ==> Additional nutrients, not including total fat or total carbohydrates, which should be entered in "Total Fat" and "Total Carbohydrate" respectively.

Baby\/BabyFood::proteinCaloriesPerGram\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Protein Calories Per Gram ==> The number of calories in one gram of protein, as may be provided in Nutritional Facts according to FDA guidelines.
Protein Calories Per Gram ==> The number of calories in one gram of protein, as may be provided in Nutritional Facts according to FDA guidelines.

Baby\/BabyFood::totalProteinPercentageDa.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Protein Percentage Daily Value ==> Percent daily value of protein per serving.

Baby\/BabyFood::totalProtein\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Protein Per Serving ==> Total protein per serving, expressed in grams, milligrams, or less than.

Baby\/BabyFood::totalProtein\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Protein Per Serving ==> Total protein per serving, expressed in grams, milligrams, or less than.

Baby\/BabyFood::foodForm.walmart_attribute_doc: Food Form ==> Describes the form of the food if the food is sold in a variety of forms, such as sliced and unsliced, whole or halves, etc.

Baby\/BabyFood::containerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Container Type ==> The kind of physical package or receptacle that contains the product as presented to the consumer. Also used to describe storage items. Consumers may select different products based on their container preferences. For example, a parent may select juice packaged in boxes rather than bottles for use in childrens' lunch boxes.

Baby\/BabyFood::isImitation.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Imitation ==> Generally a new food that resembles a traditional food and is a substitute for the traditional food must be labeled as an imitation, especially if the new food contains less protein or a lesser amount of any essential vitamin or mineral.

Baby\/BabyFood::usdaInspected.walmart_attribute_doc: USDA-Inspected ==> Has your product been inspected by the United States Department of Agriculture? There are a number of food products that are under the jurisdiction of the Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS), and are thus subject to inspection, including: egg products (liquid, frozen or dried), meat, and poultry. Refer to the FDA / USDA Food Standards and Labeling Policy Book for exceptions and more detailed guidelines.

Baby\/BabyFood::hasHighFructoseCornSyrup.walmart_attribute_doc: Has High Fructose Corn Syrup ==> Select "Y" if High Fructose Corn Syrup is in the ingredient list.

Baby\/BabyFood::fluidOuncesSupplying100C.walmart_attribute_doc: Fluid Ounces Supplying 100 Calories ==> Statement of the number of fluid ounces required to supply 100 calories, for use with baby formula only.
Fluid Ounces Supplying 100 Calories ==> Statement of the number of fluid ounces required to supply 100 calories, for use with baby formula only.

Baby\/BabyFood::foodAllergenStatements.walmart_attribute_doc: Allergens ==> Statement regarding any ingredients that may be food allergens, often written as "Contains X" or "Manufactured in a facility which processes Y."

Baby\/BabyFood::babyFoodPackaging.walmart_attribute_doc: Baby Food Packaging ==> Description of the type of packaging for baby food product. This is used as a sorting category when visitors search for baby food on Walmart.com. It is recommended to use example values for searchability. If your product falls outside those values, then you may enter another appropriate value.

Baby\/BabyFood::babyFormulaStage.walmart_attribute_doc: Baby Formula Stage ==> If the baby formula states that it is for a particular life stage, enter it here.

Baby\/BabyFood::babyFoodStage.walmart_attribute_doc: Baby Food Stage ==> Attribute designed to capture the generalized age grouping (commonly referred to as "stage") of a given baby food, as specified by manufacturer. Specific description of each stage varies with baby food producer. Example descriptions: Stage 1 - Foods have a single ingredient and are pureed and generally contain about 2.5 oz of fruits, veggies or meats. Stage 2 – Foods are strained instead of pureed and have a combination of fruits or veggies instead of single ingredients, contain larger portions. Stage 3 – Foods are mashed and have more texture than the pureed foods and may have bits and chunks of meats or veggies.

Baby\/BabyFood::instructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Instructions ==> Detailed information telling how the product should be operated or assembled.

Baby\/BabyFood::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Baby\/BabyFood::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Baby\/BabyFood::safeHandlingInstructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Safe Handling Instructions ==> Instructions for storage or preparation of potentially hazardous fresh food. NOTE: Required for raw meat products.

Baby\/BabyFood::cuisine.walmart_attribute_doc: Cuisine ==> Indicates the cooking style, especially regional or cultural cuisines, you might use the food to prepare.

Baby\/BabyFood::foodPreparationTips.walmart_attribute_doc: Food Preparation Tips ==> Helpful information related to food preparation.

Baby\/BabyFood::foodStorageTips.walmart_attribute_doc: Food Storage Tips ==> Helpful information related to food storage.

Baby\/BabyOther::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Baby\/BabyOther::keyFeatures/keyFeatures.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Baby\/BabyOther::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Baby\/BabyOther::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Baby\/BabyOther::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Baby\/BabyOther::manufacturerPartNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Baby\/BabyOther::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Baby\/BabyOther::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Baby\/BabyOther::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Baby\/BabyOther::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Baby\/BabyOther::productSecondaryImageUR.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Baby\/BabyOther::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Baby\/BabyOther::colorCategory\/colorCat.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Baby\/BabyOther::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

Baby\/BabyOther::bedSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Bed Size ==> Denotes the size of a bed, a bed's parts, mattress or bed linens in standard sizes.

Baby\/BabyOther::diaperSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Diaper Size ==> Specific size relating to diapers.

Baby\/BabyOther::diaposableBabyDiaperTyp.walmart_attribute_doc: Disposable Baby Diaper Category ==> Type of disposable diaper

Baby\/BabyOther::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

Baby\/BabyOther::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

Baby\/BabyOther::ageGroup\/ageGroupValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

Baby\/BabyOther::ageRange.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Range ==> Minimum and Maximum Ages for a product. Note: Both Min. and Max. attributes will be the same Unit of Measure: Months, or Years.

Baby\/BabyOther::minimumWeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Minimum Weight ==> The lower weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Maximum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Maximum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyOther::minimumWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Minimum Weight ==> The lower weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Maximum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Maximum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyOther::maximumWeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Weight ==> The upper weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Minimum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Minimum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyOther::maximumWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Weight ==> The upper weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Minimum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Minimum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyOther::scent.walmart_attribute_doc: Scent ==> Descriptive term for fragrance labeled on the product, if any. "Unscented" is a scent, if labeled. If no scent is specifically labeled, leave blank.

Baby\/BabyOther::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

Baby\/BabyOther::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Baby\/BabyOther::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Baby\/BabyOther::assembledProductLength\.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Baby\/BabyOther::assembledProductWidth\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Baby\/BabyOther::assembledProductHeight\.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Baby\/BabyOther::assembledProductWeight\.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Baby\/BabyOther::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Baby\/BabyOther::variantAttributeNames\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Baby\/BabyOther::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Baby\/BabyOther::isProp65WarningRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Baby\/BabyOther::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Baby\/BabyOther::smallPartsWarnings\/sma.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Baby\/BabyOther::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Baby\/BabyOther::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Baby\/BabyOther::hasPricePerUnit.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Price Per Unit ==> Mark as "Y" if your item is any of the following: food used for human or domestic animal consumption; ingredients added to food; napkins; tissues; toilet paper; foil, plastic wrap, wax paper, parchment paper; paper towels; disposable plates, bowls, and cutlery; detergents, soaps, waxes, and other cleansing agents; non-prescription drugs, female hygeine products, and toiletries; automotive fluids and cleaners; rock salt; diapers, pullups and swimmers; fertilizer; kitty litter.

Baby\/BabyOther::pricePerUnitQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Quantity of Units ==> Enter the quantity of units for the item, based on the "PPU Unit of Measure" you selected. For example, a gallon of milk should be 128. NOTE: Do not enter the price.

Baby\/BabyOther::pricePerUnitUom.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Unit of Measure ==> The units that will be used to calculate the "Price Per Unit" for your product. For example, a gallon of milk has a "PPU Unit of Measure" of Fluid Ounces. NOTE: This may not be the Unit of Measure on the label.

Baby\/BabyOther::hasExpiration.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Expiration ==> Select Yes if product is labeled with any type of expiration or code date that indicates when product should no longer be consumed or no longer at best quality (e.g. Best If Used By, Best By, Use By, etc. ). Some examples of items with expiration dates include food, cleaning supplies, beauty products, etc.

Baby\/BabyOther::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Baby\/BabyOther::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Baby\/BabyOther::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Baby\/BabyOther::hasIngredientList.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

Baby\/BabyOther::ingredientListImage.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Baby\/BabyOther::ingredients.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.

Baby\/BabyOther::requiresTextileActLabel.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Baby\/BabyOther::countryOfOriginTextiles.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

Baby\/BabyOther::fabricContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Baby\/BabyOther::fabricCareInstructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

Baby\/BabyOther::batteriesRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Batteries Required ==> Are batteries required to use this item?

Baby\/BabyOther::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Baby\/BabyOther::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Baby\/BabyOther::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

Baby\/BabyOther::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Baby\/BabyOther::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::keyFeatures/keyFeat.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::manufacturerPartNum.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::productSecondaryIma.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Baby\/ChildCarSeats::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. Baby\/ChildCarSeats::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::babyCarrierPosition.walmart_attribute_doc: Baby Carrier Position ==> Applies to wearable baby carriers. Describes the part of the body against which the child is placed along with the direction the child faces (where applicable) while in the wearable baby carrier.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::safetyHarnessStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Safety Harness Style ==> The style of the occupant restraint harness included with the car seat, stroller, carrier, etc.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::variantAttributeNam.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::isProp65WarningRequ.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::smallPartsWarnings\.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::batteryTechnologyTy.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::hasLatchSystem.walmart_attribute_doc: Has LATCH System ==> Does the product have the LATCH system? The LATCH (Lower Anchors and Tethers for Children) system was developed to make it easier to correctly install child safety seats without using seat belts. LATCH can be found in vehicles as well as infant, convertible and forward-facing child safety seats, made after Sept. 1, 2002.

Baby\/ChildCarSeats::carSeatBaseDepth\/m.walmart_attribute_doc: Car Seat Base Depth ==> The depth or length measurement of the car seat base, a separate piece of the car seat installed using a seat belt or LATCH. Car Seats are frequently longer or shorter than the removable car seat they support.

For example, when used with "Maximum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::minimumWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Minimum Weight ==> The lower weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Maximum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Maximum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::maximumWeight\/meas.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Weight ==> The upper weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Minimum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Minimum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.
