Baby\/BabyFurniture::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Baby\/BabyFurniture::bedSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Bed Size ==> Denotes the size of a bed, a bed's parts, mattress or bed linens in standard sizes.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::mattressFirmness.walmart_attribute_doc: Mattress Firmness ==> The mattresses level of firmness.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::fillMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Fill Material ==> The material used to stuff the item (in a cushion or plush toy, for example).

Baby\/BabyFurniture::finish.walmart_attribute_doc: Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::isFoldable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Foldable ==> Indicates that an item can be folded.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::isWheeled.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Wheeled ==> Indicates that an item has wheels and can be rolled.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::homeDecorStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Home Decor Style ==> Describes home furnishings and decorations according to various themes, styles and tastes.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::assembledProductLen.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::assembledProductWid.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::assembledProductHei.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::assembledProductWei.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::variantAttributeNam.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::isProp65WarningRequ.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::smallPartsWarnings\.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::requiresTextileActL.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::countryOfOriginText.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::isAssemblyRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Assembly Required ==> Is product unassembled and must be put together before use?

Baby\/BabyFurniture::assemblyInstruction.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembly Instructions ==> Provide a URL to an image or PDF asset showing assembly instructions for items requiring assembly. URLs must be static and have no query parameters. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// and should end in in the file name.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::fabricContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::fabricCareInstructi.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

Baby\/BabyFurniture::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Baby\/BabyFurniture::collection.walmart_attribute_doc: Collection ==> A collection is a particular group of items that have the same visual style, made by the same brand.

Baby\/BabyToys::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Baby\/BabyToys::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesV.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Baby\/BabyToys::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Baby\/BabyToys::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Baby\/BabyToys::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Baby\/BabyToys::manufacturerPartNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Baby\/BabyToys::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Baby\/BabyToys::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Baby\/BabyToys::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Baby\/BabyToys::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Baby\/BabyToys::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Baby\/BabyToys::productSecondaryImageURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Baby\/BabyToys::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Can be an important selection criteria for consumers who want to achieve a particular ambiance for room décor or for a special occasion.

Baby\/BabyToys::makesNoise.walmart_attribute_doc: Makes Noise ==> Indicates that the item has a noise-making feature. For example, a toy lawn mower that makes roaring-engine sounds.

Baby\/BabyClothing::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Baby\/BabyClothing::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Baby\/BabyClothing::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Baby\/BabyClothing::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Baby\/BabyClothing::productSecondaryImag.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Baby\/BabyClothing::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Baby\/BabyClothing::colorCategory\/color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Baby\/BabyClothing::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

Baby\/BabyClothing::babyClothingSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Baby Clothing Size ==> Common sizes for infant and toddler clothing. Baby clothing sizes are sometimes expressed as age or weight.

Baby\/BabyClothing::ageGroup\/ageGroupVa.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

Baby\/BabyClothing::ageRange.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Range ==> Minimum and Maximum Ages for a product. Note: Both Min. and Max. attributes will be the same Unit of Measure: Months, or Years.

Baby\/BabyClothing::minimumWeight\/measu.walmart_attribute_doc: Minimum Weight ==> The lower weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Maximum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Maximum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyClothing::minimumWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Minimum Weight ==> The lower weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Maximum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Maximum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyClothing::maximumWeight\/measu.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Weight ==> The upper weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Minimum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Minimum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyClothing::maximumWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Weight ==> The upper weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Minimum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Minimum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Baby\/BabyClothing::season.walmart_attribute_doc: Season ==> If designed to be used during a specific type of year, the appropriate season this item may be used.

Baby\/BabyClothing::scent.walmart_attribute_doc: Scent ==> Descriptive term for fragrance labeled on the product, if any. "Unscented" is a scent, if labeled. If no scent is specifically labeled, leave blank.

Baby\/BabyClothing::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

Baby\/BabyClothing::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Baby\/BabyClothing::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Baby\/BabyClothing::shoeCategory.walmart_attribute_doc: Shoe Category ==> Grouping of footwear based on age group and gender. This attribute is used on the front end to display categories of shoes to customers.
Baby\/BabyClothing::shoeCategory.walmart_attribute_enum: Baby Girl Shoes,Baby Boy Shoes,Toddler Girl Shoes,Toddler Boy Shoes,Girls' Shoes,Boys' Shoes,Women's Shoes,Men's Shoes

Baby\/BabyClothing::shoeStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Shoe Style ==> Term identifying the group of shoes based on shared visual design characteristics (e.g. Loafer; Mary Jane; Moccasin).

Baby\/BabyClothing::shoeSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Shoe Size ==> The alphanumeric representation of the size of the shoe, as issued by the manufacturer.

Baby\/BabyClothing::shoeWidth.walmart_attribute_doc: Shoe Width ==> The width sizing of the shoe, if specified by the manufacturer.

Baby\/BabyClothing::shoeClosure.walmart_attribute_doc: Shoe Closure ==> Term that describe how a shoe is adjusted to fit around the foot. This may be important in shoe selection. For example, consumers that have difficulty tying lace-up shoes would prefer slip-ons or hook-and-loop shoe closures.

Baby\/BabyClothing::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Baby\/BabyClothing::variantAttributeName.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Baby\/BabyClothing::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Baby\/BabyClothing::isProp65WarningRequi.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Baby\/BabyClothing::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Baby\/BabyClothing::smallPartsWarnings\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Baby\/BabyClothing::requiresTextileActLa.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Baby\/BabyClothing::countryOfOriginTexti.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

Baby\/BabyClothing::fabricContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Baby\/BabyClothing::fabricCareInstructio.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

Baby\/BabyClothing::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Baby\/BabyClothing::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Baby\/BabyClothing::theme.walmart_attribute_doc: Theme ==> A dominant idea, meaning, or setting applied to an item. Used in a wide range of products including decorative objects, clothing, toys, and furniture. Can be an important selection criteria for consumers who want to achieve a particular ambiance for room décor or for a special occasion.

Baby\/BabyClothing::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

Baby\/BabyClothing::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Baby\/BabyClothing::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::sh.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ke.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::br.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ma.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::mo.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::mu.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::co.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::pi.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ca.walmart_attribute_doc: Capacity ==> A product's available space. Capacity is often provided for items that contain multiple pieces of something or that can accommodate some number of objects.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::nu.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Wheels ==> Number of wheels on the item. Allows selection based on consumer preference for a 2 wheel vs. 4-wheel suitcase for example.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ha.walmart_attribute_doc: Hard or Soft Case ==> Indicates whether a case is a hard or soft.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::is.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Wheeled ==> Indicates that an item has wheels and can be rolled.

Compatible Devices ==> A list of the devices compatible with the item.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ba.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ba.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ha.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::wa.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::re.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. The meaning varies with context of product. CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::fi.walmart_attribute_doc: Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::nu.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Compartments ==> Number of separate compartments (as opposed to pockets) that a bag has.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ha.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Removable Strap ==> Indicates that the item has a removable strap.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::de.walmart_attribute_doc: Designer ==> Name of the person who planned the form, look, or workings of the product to be made or built.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ch.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ha.walmart_attribute_doc: Handle Material ==> Material of the handle, if different from the rest of the item.
Handle Type ==> The kind of design of the handle or grip portion of the item. Consumers often prefer a certain handle type - a crook handle umbrella, for example.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::zi.walmart_attribute_doc: Zipper Material ==> Substance the zipper chain is made of. Important information to consumers that prefer a metal zipper to a plastic one, for example.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::lo.walmart_attribute_doc: Locking Mechanism ==> Type of internal mechanism that locks the item.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::le.walmart_attribute_doc: Leather Grade ==> Grade of leather used in the item.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::is.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Weather-Resistant ==> Y indicates that the item has been made or is marketed as being resistant to elements of weather, such as rain, wind or cold.
Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::fa.walmart_attribute_doc: Fastener Type ==> The type of fastener used to keep a garment closed on the wearer and to facilitate putting on the garment.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::sp.walmart_attribute_doc: Sport ==> If the product is sports-related, the name of the specific sport depicted on the product, or the target sport for the product use

Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.
Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::at.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::au.walmart_attribute_doc: Autographed by ==> The full name of the person who has autographed this copy.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::fe.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::ke.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::mo.walmart_attribute_doc: Monogram Letter ==> If the item has a monogram, indicate the letter/s.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::is.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Reusable ==> Indicates the item can be used more than once.
Is Foldable ==> Indicates that an item can be folded.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::gl.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::is.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Lined ==> Indicates if the item contains a material lining on the interior.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::re.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::oc.walmart_attribute_doc: Occasion ==> The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::is.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Made From Recycled Material ==> Indicates that the item is made from recycled materials.

CarriersAndAccessories\/CasesAndBags::re.walmart_attribute_doc: Recycled Material Content ==> If item contains reused/recycled material, the percentage of all recycled material used to produce the item. This can also include specific material composition; cushions made from 30% recycled cotton fabric. Used to highlight sustainability to the customer.

CarriersAndAccessories::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

CarriersAndAccessories::keyFeatures/keyF.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

CarriersAndAccessories::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

CarriersAndAccessories::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

CarriersAndAccessories::manufacturerPart.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

CarriersAndAccessories::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

CarriersAndAccessories::multipackQuantit.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

CarriersAndAccessories::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

CarriersAndAccessories::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

CarriersAndAccessories::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

CarriersAndAccessories::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

CarriersAndAccessories::productSecondary.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

CarriersAndAccessories::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

CarriersAndAccessories::colorCategory\/c.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

CarriersAndAccessories::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

CarriersAndAccessories::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

CarriersAndAccessories::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

CarriersAndAccessories::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

CarriersAndAccessories::ageGroup\/ageGro.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

CarriersAndAccessories::dimensions.walmart_attribute_doc: Dimensions ==> Appropriate dimensions for the product, from the consumer point of view.

CarriersAndAccessories::capacity.walmart_attribute_doc: Capacity ==> A product's available space. Capacity is often provided for items that contain multiple pieces of something or that can accommodate some number of objects.

CarriersAndAccessories::isWheeled.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Wheeled ==> Indicates that an item has wheels and can be rolled.

CarriersAndAccessories::numberOfWheels.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Wheels ==> Number of wheels on the item. Allows selection based on consumer preference for a 2 wheel vs. 4-wheel suitcase for example.

CarriersAndAccessories::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

CarriersAndAccessories::assembledProduct.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

CarriersAndAccessories::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

CarriersAndAccessories::variantAttribute.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

CarriersAndAccessories::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

CarriersAndAccessories::isProp65WarningR.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

CarriersAndAccessories::prop65WarningTex.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

CarriersAndAccessories::batteryTechnolog.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
CarriersAndAccessories::batteryTechnolog.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

CarriersAndAccessories::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

CarriersAndAccessories::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

CarriersAndAccessories::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

CarriersAndAccessories::requiresTextileA.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

CarriersAndAccessories::countryOfOriginT.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

CarriersAndAccessories::fabricContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

CarriersAndAccessories::fabricCareInstru.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

CarriersAndAccessories::handleMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Handle Material ==> Material of the handle, if different from the rest of the item.

CarriersAndAccessories::handleType.walmart_attribute_doc: Handle Type ==> The kind of design of the handle or grip portion of the item. Consumers often prefer a certain handle type - a crook handle umbrella, for example.

CarriersAndAccessories::zipperMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Zipper Material ==> Substance the zipper chain is made of. Important information to consumers that prefer a metal zipper to a plastic one, for example.

CarriersAndAccessories::lockingMechanism.walmart_attribute_doc: Locking Mechanism ==> Type of internal mechanism that locks the item.

CarriersAndAccessories::leatherGrade.walmart_attribute_doc: Leather Grade ==> Grade of leather used in the item.

CarriersAndAccessories::bagCaseFeature.walmart_attribute_doc: Bag/Case Feature ==> Distinguishing characteristics of cases and bags that describe appearance, components, and capabilities. These features are specific to bags and cases and typically highlight the usefulness/advantages of these products to consumers. Products include cell phone cases, suitcases, and handbags.

CarriersAndAccessories::isWeatherResista.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Weather-Resistant ==> Y indicates that the item has been made or is marketed as being resistant to elements of weather, such as rain, wind or cold.

CarriersAndAccessories::isWaterproof.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

CarriersAndAccessories::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

CarriersAndAccessories::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

CarriersAndAccessories::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

CarriersAndAccessories::autographedBy.walmart_attribute_doc: Autographed by ==> The full name of the person who has autographed this copy.

CarriersAndAccessories::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

CarriersAndAccessories::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

CarriersAndAccessories::monogramLetter.walmart_attribute_doc: Monogram Letter ==> If the item has a monogram, indicate the letter/s.

CarriersAndAccessories::isMadeFromRecycl.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Made From Recycled Material ==> Indicates that the item is made from recycled materials.

CarriersAndAccessories::recycledMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Recycled Material Content ==> If item contains reused/recycled material, the percentage of all recycled material used to produce the item. This can also include specific material composition; cushions made from 30% recycled cotton fabric. Used to highlight sustainability to the customer.

CarriersAndAccessories::isFairTrade.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Fair Trade ==> Indicates that the item is certified to be fairly traded.

CarriersAndAccessories::designer.walmart_attribute_doc: Designer ==> Name of the person who planned the form, look, or workings of the product to be made or built.

CarriersAndAccessories::globalBrandLicen.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

CarriersAndAccessories::isLined.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Lined ==> Indicates if the item contains a material lining on the interior.

Clothing::clothingSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Clothing Size ==> Clothing size as it appears on the garment label. Use this attribute for general sizes (S, M, L) as well as general numbered sizes (2, 4, 6, etc). For items that have unique sizes (dress shirts, bras, etc.) use the specific size attribute.

Clothing::isSet.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Set ==> Y indicates that the product consists of two or more different items sold together as a set. Example: A bedding set that includes sheets, pillow shams, and a comforter.

Clothing::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Clothing::smallPartsWarnings\/smallParts.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.
