Allows selection of plants based on purpose and/ or visual effect. For example, consumers that wanted to compare live and artificial trees for their living room.

GardenAndPatio::fuelType.walmart_attribute_doc: Fuel Type ==> The kind of material that a product consumes to produce heat or power. Attribute is also used to classify a fuel product.

GardenAndPatio::cuttingWidth.walmart_attribute_doc: Cutting Width ==> The width that a cutting machine, such as a lawn mower, creates along its cutting path.

GardenAndPatio::clearingWidth\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Clearing Width ==> Measurement of the width that a machine clears (rather than cleans). Typically applied to how wide a path a snow blowing machine clears. Clearing width and intake height determine how much snow the machine can take in.

GardenAndPatio::clearingWidth\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Clearing Width ==> Measurement of the width that a machine clears (rather than cleans). Typically applied to how wide a path a snow blowing machine clears. Clearing width and intake height determine how much snow the machine can take in.

GardenAndPatio::sprayPatterns.walmart_attribute_doc: Spray Patterns ==> The patterns of water spray from an adjustable shower head, nozzle, or similar.

GardenAndPatio::diameter\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.

GardenAndPatio::diameter\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.

GardenAndPatio::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

GardenAndPatio::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

GardenAndPatio::installationType.walmart_attribute_doc: Installation Type ==> Term describing the setting necessary to make an item ready to be used. For example, a grill that is designed for a built-in type installation.

GardenAndPatio::ageGroup\/ageGroupValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

GardenAndPatio::homeDecorStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Home Decor Style ==> Describes home furnishings and decorations according to various themes, styles and tastes.

GardenAndPatio::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

GardenAndPatio::isIndustrial.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Industrial ==> Indicates that an item can be used in an industrial setting or has an industrial application.

GardenAndPatio::isEnergyStarCertified.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Energy Star-Certified ==> Indicate Y if the product has been certified by the EPA Energy Star program.

GardenAndPatio::hasRadiantHeat.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Radiant Heat ==> Y indicates this item generates infrared heat as a feature. For example, outdoor grills that have an infrared unit that is designed to keep food juicer and provide more temperature control as compared with charcoal.

GardenAndPatio::flowRate\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Flow Rate ==> Measurement of the volume of liquid per unit of time, intended for products like pumps, sprayers, showerheads, and irrigation regulators. Measured in gallons per minute.

GardenAndPatio::flowRate\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Flow Rate ==> Measurement of the volume of liquid per unit of time, intended for products like pumps, sprayers, showerheads, and irrigation regulators. Measured in gallons per minute.

GardenAndPatio::hasAutomaticShutoff.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Automatic Shutoff ==> Y indicates the item has a mechanism that automatically shuts off the device or shuts off flow to the device. This is important to consumers to conserve resources or as a safety feature. It is used for a variety of products including hoses, appliances and gas grills.

GardenAndPatio::capacity.walmart_attribute_doc: Capacity ==> A product's available space. Capacity is often provided for items that contain multiple pieces of something or that can accommodate some number of objects.

GardenAndPatio::productVolume.walmart_attribute_doc: Product Volume ==> The amount of material in the item’s package, expressed as a volume measurement. Important selection factor for items sold by volume such as bags of potting soil.

GardenAndPatio::cleaningCareAndMaintenan.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

GardenAndPatio::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

GardenAndPatio::flooringMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Flooring Material ==> If item has a floor, the substance the flooring is made of. For example, if a storage shed has a floor made out of plywood.

GardenAndPatio::minimumClearance\/measur.walmart_attribute_doc: Minimum Clearance ==> The measurement of clearance distance from the item to a specific reference point as specified by the manufacturer for safe operation and/or the capability of meeting building code requirements. For example, certain types of awnings require a minimum of 8 inches of unobstructed vertical space as measured from the top of an egress door to any roof, eave or overhang

GardenAndPatio::minimumClearance\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Minimum Clearance ==> The measurement of clearance distance from the item to a specific reference point as specified by the manufacturer for safe operation and/or the capability of meeting building code requirements. For example, certain types of awnings require a minimum of 8 inches of unobstructed vertical space as measured from the top of an egress door to any roof, eave or overhang

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::shortDescr.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::keyFeature.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::manufactur.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::modelNumbe.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::countPerPa.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::multipackQ.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::mainImageU.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::productSec.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::maximumWei.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Weight ==> The upper weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Minimum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Minimum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::isLatexFre.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Latex-Free ==> Y indicates that the item does not contain natural rubber/natural rubber latex. Used for products that have versions made with latex. Many consumers are allergic to latex and need to select latex-free products such as disposable gloves, gum stimulators, and adhesive bandages.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::isWaterpro.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::isFoldable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Foldable ==> Indicates that an item can be folded.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::isInflatab.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Inflatable ==> Indicates that an item can be inflated.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::isWheeled.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Wheeled ==> Indicates that an item has wheels and can be rolled.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::isIndustri.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Industrial ==> Indicates that an item can be used in an industrial setting or has an industrial application.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::assembledP.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::variantGro.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::variantAtt.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::isPrimaryV.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::isProp65Wa.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::prop65Warn.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::smallParts.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::batteryTec.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::batteryTec.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::hasWarrant.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::warrantyUR.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::warrantyTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::fabricCont.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::fabricCare.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::isPowered.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Powered ==> Y indicates that an item uses electricity, requiring a power cord or batteries to operate. Useful for items that have non-powered equivalents (e.g. toothbrushes).

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::flexibleSp.walmart_attribute_doc: Flexible Spending Account-Eligible ==> Indicates if item is FSA-Eligible.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::recommende.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::cleaningCa.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::driveSyste.walmart_attribute_doc: Drive System ==> Refers to the position of drive system for machines.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::bodyParts.walmart_attribute_doc: Body Part ==> The body part/s for which the item is intended.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicalAids::collection.walmart_attribute_doc: Collection ==> A collection is a particular group of items that have the same visual style, made by the same brand.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::prop65WarningT.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::batteryTechnol.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::batteryTechnol.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::eyewearRimStyl.walmart_attribute_doc: Eyewear Rim ==> Whether eyewear has rims, partial rims, or no rim at all.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::hasAdaptiveLen.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Adaptive Lenses ==> Indicates that lenses transition from clear to tinted when exposed to light.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::isPolarized.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Polarized ==> Indicates if eyeglasses are polarized.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::isScratchResis.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Scratch-Resistant ==> Y indicates the item has specially designed or treated material to resist damage from scratching. Primarily used for optical products that feature scratch resistant lenses.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::lensMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Lens Material ==> The substance an optical lens is made out of.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::lensTint.walmart_attribute_doc: Lens Tint ==> Color of lens tint.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::lensType.walmart_attribute_doc: Eyewear Focal Type ==> Whether the lens is single, multifocal, or tinted

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::sunglassesStyl.walmart_attribute_doc: Sunglasses Style ==> Descriptive terms for sunglass styles. Styles not specific to sunglasses can be found in the Eyewear Frame Style attribute.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::uvRating.walmart_attribute_doc: UV Rating ==> Ultraviolet rating for eyewear.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::flexibleSpendi.walmart_attribute_doc: Flexible Spending Account-Eligible ==> Indicates if item is FSA-Eligible.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::globalBrandLic.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::cleaningCareAn.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::eyewearLensFea.walmart_attribute_doc: Eyewear Lens Feature ==> Features specific to eyewear lenses, including lens treatments and modular lens features.

HealthAndBeauty\/Optical::eyewearFrameSt.walmart_attribute_doc: Eyewear Frame Style ==> Fashion style/design of eyeglasses frames.

HealthAndBeauty\/MedicineAndSupplements:.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Flavor ==> The distinctive taste or flavor of the item, as provided by manufacturer. This is used for a wide variety of products, including food and beverages for both animals and humans. This may also apply to non-food items that come in flavors, including dental products, cigars and smoker wood chips.
Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.
Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.
Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).
Body Part ==> The body part/s for which the item is intended.
Health Concerns ==> Type of medical condition/illness/well being/life stage that the item is intended to address.
Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.
Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Has Price Per Unit ==> Mark as "Y" if your item is any of the following: food used for human or domestic animal consumption; ingredients added to food; napkins; tissues; toilet paper; foil, plastic wrap, wax paper, parchment paper; paper towels; disposable plates, bowls, and cutlery; detergents, soaps, waxes, and other cleansing agents; non-prescription drugs, female hygeine products, and toiletries; automotive fluids and cleaners; rock salt; diapers, pullups and swimmers; fertilizer; kitty litter.
PPU Quantity of Units ==> Enter the quantity of units for the item, based on the "PPU Unit of Measure" you selected. For example, a gallon of milk should be 128. NOTE: Do not enter the price.

PPU Unit of Measure ==> The units that will be used to calculate the "Price Per Unit" for your product. For example, a gallon of milk has a "PPU Unit of Measure" of Fluid Ounces. NOTE: This may not be the Unit of Measure on the label.

Is Drug Facts Label Required ==> Y indicates that your product is a drug as defined by the FDA. A drug is a substance intended for use in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease. If yes, you must provide an image of: 1) your drug facts label, 2) dosage instruction/directions, and 3) active/inactive ingredients. All three image attributes are required. If your image contains more than one element, you may repeat the same image.

Drug Facts Label Image ==> URL of the Drug Facts label's image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension such as, .jpg, .png or .gif. (200 character max)

Drug Facts Dosage / Instructions Image ==> Please provide the image URL of the Dosage / Instructions, if not included in another image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.
Drug Facts Active / Inactive Ingredients Image ==> Provide a URL of the image containing the Active/Inactive Ingredients, if not included in another image.

Is Supplement Facts Label Required ==> Y indicates that your product is a Supplement. A Supplement is a product intended for ingestion that contains a "dietary ingredient" intended to add additional nutritional value to a diet. A "dietary ingredient" may be one, or any combination of, the following substances: a vitamin, a mineral, an herb, or other botanical. If yes, we need images of the following three elements: 1) The supplement facts, 2) the dosage and/or instructions, and 3) the list of active / inactive ingredients. All three attributes are required. If one image provides more than one of these elements, a URL may be repeated.

Supplement Facts Label Image ==> Image URL of the location of the Supplement Facts label. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.
Supplement Dosage / Instructions Image ==> If Is Supplement Facts Label Required = Y, please provide an image that includes the instructions and/or dosage, if not included in another image.

Supplement Active / Inactive Ingredients Image ==> If is Supplement Facts Label Required = Y, then please provide an image of the Active / Inactive Ingredient list. If this element is already provided in another image, you may use the same URL here.

Is Nutrition Facts Label Required ==> Indicates if item requires nutritional facts labeling per FDA guidelines. If yes, please provide the following elements in one or more images 1) The Nutrition Facts and 2) Ingredients. Both attributes are required. If both elements are contained in one image, you may repeat the URL in both attributes.

Nutrition Facts Label Image ==> Image URL of the nutritional facts label. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.
Has GMOs ==> Does your product contain Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOS) whose DNA has been altered using genetic engineering techniques?

Has Expiration ==> Select Yes if product is labeled with any type of expiration or code date that indicates when product should no longer be consumed or no longer at best quality (e.g. Best If Used By, Best By, Use By, etc. ). Some examples of items with expiration dates include food, cleaning supplies, beauty products, etc.

Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.
Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)
Active Ingredients ==> The list of active ingredients in order of potency, as shown on the item label.
Inactive Ingredients ==> The list of inactive ingredients in order of potency, as shown on the item label.
Form ==> Describes the way the item is dispensed or consumed, including its texture or other physical characteristics.
Instructions ==> Detailed information telling how the product should be operated or assembled.
Dosage ==> The amount of a medication, drug, or supplement that is directed to be taken, or applied at one time or regularly during a period of time, as specified by the manufacturer.
Stop Use Indications ==> Text that describes symptoms, or lack thereof that indicate when to stop taking a medicine.
Medicine Strength ==> The amount of active ingredient contained in each medicine form (e.g. amount per capsule, amount per tablet).

National Drug Code ==> Universal product identifier for human drugs that is is present on all nonprescription (OTC) and prescription medication packages and inserts in the United States. The NDC is a unique 10-digit, 3-segment numeric identifier assigned to each medication listed under Section 510 of the US Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
Supplements ==> Additional nutrients, not including total fat or total carbohydrates, which should be entered in "Total Fat" and "Total Carbohydrate" respectively.

Serving Size ==> Measurement value specifying the amount of the item typically used as a reference on the label of that item to list per serving information (nutrients, calories, total fat). Applicable for a wide variety of products including food, beverages, and nutritional supplements.
Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.
Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.
Swatch Variant Attribute ==> Conditionally Required
Swatch Image URL ==> Conditionally Required

Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.
