If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.
Is Powered ==> Y indicates that an item uses electricity, requiring a power cord or batteries to operate. Useful for items that have non-powered equivalents (e.g. toothbrushes).
Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.
Flexible Spending Account-Eligible ==> Indicates if item is FSA-Eligible.

Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.
Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.
Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)
Tracking Mode ==> Describes the different types units that physical activity can be tracked: steps, calories, etc.
Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.
Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.
Body Part ==> The body part/s for which the item is intended.
Collection ==> A collection is a particular group of items that have the same visual style, made by the same brand.
Is Set ==> Y indicates that the product consists of two or more different items sold together as a set. Example: A bedding set that includes sheets, pillow shams, and a comforter.
Is Travel Size ==> Please indicate whether the product is a smaller version of a larger-sized product.
Is Portable ==> Is the item designed to be easily moved?
Is Reusable ==> Indicates the item can be used more than once.
Is Disposable ==> Indicates the item is intended for single use.
Is Cordless ==> Indicate Y if the product type in general has a corded equivalent, and the absence of a cord is a feature.

Has Automatic Shutoff ==> Y indicates the item has a mechanism that automatically shuts off the device or shuts off flow to the device. This is important to consumers to conserve resources or as a safety feature. It is used for a variety of products including hoses, appliances and gas grills.
Swatch Variant Attribute ==> Conditionally Required
Swatch Image URL ==> Conditionally Required

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::shortDesc.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::keyFeatur.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::manufactu.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::modelNumb.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::multipack.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::countPerP.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::pieceCoun.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::mainImage.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::productSe.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::colorCate.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::ageGroup\.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::bodyParts.walmart_attribute_doc: Body Part ==> The body part/s for which the item is intended.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::collectio.walmart_attribute_doc: Collection ==> A collection is a particular group of items that have the same visual style, made by the same brand.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::scent.walmart_attribute_doc: Scent ==> Descriptive term for fragrance labeled on the product, if any. "Unscented" is a scent, if labeled. If no scent is specifically labeled, leave blank.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::flavor.walmart_attribute_doc: Flavor ==> The distinctive taste or flavor of the item, as provided by manufacturer. This is used for a wide variety of products, including food and beverages for both animals and humans. This may also apply to non-food items that come in flavors, including dental products, cigars and smoker wood chips.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::assembled.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::variantGr.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::variantAt.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isPrimary.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isProp65W.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::prop65War.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::smallPart.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::batteryTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::batteryTe.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::hasPriceP.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Price Per Unit ==> Mark as "Y" if your item is any of the following: food used for human or domestic animal consumption; ingredients added to food; napkins; tissues; toilet paper; foil, plastic wrap, wax paper, parchment paper; paper towels; disposable plates, bowls, and cutlery; detergents, soaps, waxes, and other cleansing agents; non-prescription drugs, female hygeine products, and toiletries; automotive fluids and cleaners; rock salt; diapers, pullups and swimmers; fertilizer; kitty litter.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::pricePerU.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Quantity of Units ==> Enter the quantity of units for the item, based on the "PPU Unit of Measure" you selected. For example, a gallon of milk should be 128. NOTE: Do not enter the price.

PPU Unit of Measure ==> The units that will be used to calculate the "Price Per Unit" for your product. For example, a gallon of milk has a "PPU Unit of Measure" of Fluid Ounces. NOTE: This may not be the Unit of Measure on the label.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isDrugFac.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Drug Facts Label Required ==> Y indicates that your product is a drug as defined by the FDA. A drug is a substance intended for use in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease. If yes, you must provide an image of: 1) your drug facts label, 2) dosage instruction/directions, and 3) active/inactive ingredients. All three image attributes are required. If your image contains more than one element, you may repeat the same image.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::drugFacts.walmart_attribute_doc: Drug Facts Label Image ==> URL of the Drug Facts label's image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension such as, .jpg, .png or .gif. (200 character max)

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::drugDosag.walmart_attribute_doc: Drug Facts Dosage / Instructions Image ==> Please provide the image URL of the Dosage / Instructions, if not included in another image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::drugActiv.walmart_attribute_doc: Drug Facts Active / Inactive Ingredients Image ==> Provide a URL of the image containing the Active/Inactive Ingredients, if not included in another image.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::hasIngred.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::ingredien.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::hasGMOs.walmart_attribute_doc: Has GMOs ==> Does your product contain Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOS) whose DNA has been altered using genetic engineering techniques?

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::skinCareC.walmart_attribute_doc: Skin Care Concern ==> Type of skin concern that product is targeted for, or claims to correct. Note this is different from "Skin Type," which is a separate attribute. "Dry Cracked Skin" may be a skin concern, but "Dry Skin" may be a Skin Type.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::skinType.walmart_attribute_doc: Skin Type ==> "Skin type" refers to the category of variations that a product may be targeted for, usually referring either to the oiliness/dryness spectrum, or whether it is sensitive.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::skinTone.walmart_attribute_doc: Skin Tone ==> Color of skin that a product is targeted for, if labeled on the product. Note: This is distinct from the color of the product. "Light Beige" may be a color, while "Fair" may be a skin tone.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::spfValue.walmart_attribute_doc: SPF Value ==> Number indicating the ability of a product to screen or block out the burning rays of the sun. A product with a higher the Sun Protection Factor (SPF) value allows a greater time exposure without burning. SPF values are found in products such as sunscreens, makeup and some clothing.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::hairType.walmart_attribute_doc: Hair Type ==> Kind of hair the product is best suited for. Used to match hair characteristics such as texture, oiliness, and density with product features. For example, a volumizing and thickening conditioner would be suited to fine hair.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isAdultPr.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Adult Product ==> Indicates if item is adult in nature and should not appear in results for children's products.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::recommend.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::globalBra.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::activeIng.walmart_attribute_doc: Active Ingredients ==> The list of active ingredients in order of potency, as shown on the item label.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::inactiveI.walmart_attribute_doc: Inactive Ingredients ==> The list of inactive ingredients in order of potency, as shown on the item label.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::form.walmart_attribute_doc: Form ==> Describes the way the item is dispensed or consumed, including its texture or other physical characteristics.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::instructi.walmart_attribute_doc: Instructions ==> Detailed information telling how the product should be operated or assembled.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::stopUseIn.walmart_attribute_doc: Stop Use Indications ==> Text that describes symptoms, or lack thereof that indicate when to stop taking a medicine.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::compatibl.walmart_attribute_doc: Compatible Brands ==> A list of the brands most commonly compatible with the item.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isSet.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Set ==> Y indicates that the product consists of two or more different items sold together as a set. Example: A bedding set that includes sheets, pillow shams, and a comforter.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isTravelS.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Travel Size ==> Please indicate whether the product is a smaller version of a larger-sized product.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isPortabl.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Portable ==> Is the item designed to be easily moved?

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isReusabl.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Reusable ==> Indicates the item can be used more than once.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isDisposa.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Disposable ==> Indicates the item is intended for single use.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isPowered.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Powered ==> Y indicates that an item uses electricity, requiring a power cord or batteries to operate. Useful for items that have non-powered equivalents (e.g. toothbrushes).

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::flexibleS.walmart_attribute_doc: Flexible Spending Account-Eligible ==> Indicates if item is FSA-Eligible.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::cleaningC.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::batteries.walmart_attribute_doc: Batteries Required ==> Are batteries required to use this item?

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::resultTim.walmart_attribute_doc: Result Time ==> Duration of time necessary to see the outcome from using a product. Typically used for medical and personal care test kits and monitors.
Result Time ==> Duration of time necessary to see the outcome from using a product. Typically used for medical and personal care test kits and monitors.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isNoncomo.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Noncomedogenic ==> Y indicates the product has been specially formulated not to plug pores of the skin that would cause skin breakouts. Used in personal care products such as makeup, lotions, and facial masks.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isTinted.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Tinted ==> Y indicates the product has a small amount of a particular color. For example, a tinted moisturizer that includes a small amount of makeup and is therefore, a lighter formula than foundation.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isSelfTan.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Self-Tanning ==> Y indicates the product has ingredients such as dihydroxyacetone (DHA) that color the skin for a tanned look without exposure to the sun or ultraviolet light. Used in personal care products including self-tanning lotions, sprays, and bronzers.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isWaterpr.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::isUnscent.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Unscented ==> Y indicates the item does not have added fragrance. Used for products that have scented equivalents. Consumers often prefer unscented versions of products such as soaps, toilet paper and candles.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::absorbenc.walmart_attribute_doc: Absorbency ==> Term describing the ability of a product to absorb moisture. Used in personal care products such as pads and liners.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::sportsLea.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::sportsTea.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::wigCapSty.walmart_attribute_doc: Wig Cap Style ==> The construction style of the wig cap (also called the "wig base"), affecting the wig's appearance, durability, and styling options.
HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::wigCapSty.walmart_attribute_enum: 100% Hand-Tied,Full Lace,Lace Front Wig Caps,Monofiliment,Thin Skin Wig Caps,Wefted Wig Caps

HealthAndBeauty\/PersonalCare::hairColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Hair Color Category ==> Term for a basic color of human hair. Used both to describe a group of hair color dyes and to describe a component part of an item such as a doll's hair color. Values do not include "Brunette" because it is not a color, but describes a person with dark brown hair. Non-Natural would include colors like pink, green, and purple.

Jewelry::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Jewelry::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Jewelry::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Jewelry::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Jewelry::manufacturerPartNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Jewelry::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Jewelry::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Jewelry::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Jewelry::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Jewelry::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Jewelry::productSecondaryImageURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Jewelry::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> Material for general jewelry items. Enter precious metals and purities under "Metal Type" and "Metal Stamp."

Jewelry::jewelryStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Fine or Fashion ==> Fine jewelry indicates a high-quality of material, workmanship, and durability. Fashion (sometimes called "costume" or "cosmetic") jewelry is made from inexpensive materials, is usually mass-produced, and has a generally lower level of quality.

Jewelry::metal.walmart_attribute_doc: Metal ==> For items made primarily of metal, or where the metal component plays an important part in the makeup of the item and purchasing decision.

Jewelry::metalStamp.walmart_attribute_doc: Metal Stamp ==> Most jewelry items made of precious metal are stamped with information about the purity level of the metal content. Generally the stamp is placed in an inconspicuous place on the item so it does not detract from the design. Stamps will usually be located on the inside of the band on a ring, on the post or basket setting on a pair of earrings, on the bail (the part that the chain slides through) on a pendant, and on the connecting ring or the clasp on a necklace or bracelet. All jewelry stamps adhere to strict guidelines set by the Federal Trade Commission.

Jewelry::karats\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Gold Purity - Karats ==> Measure of the purity or fineness of gold in an alloy, 100% pure gold being 24 Karats.

Jewelry::karats\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Gold Purity - Karats ==> Measure of the purity or fineness of gold in an alloy, 100% pure gold being 24 Karats.

Jewelry::plating.walmart_attribute_doc: Plating ==> Metal plating. Use for items where the plating is a central feature, or important to the buying decision.

Jewelry::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

Jewelry::ageGroup\/ageGroupValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

Jewelry::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

Jewelry::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Jewelry::occasion.walmart_attribute_doc: Occasion ==> The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product.

Jewelry::personalRelationship.walmart_attribute_doc: Personal Relationship ==> Descriptive terms for the roles people have in each other's lives, commonly centered on family or romance.

Jewelry::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Jewelry::variantAttributeNames\/variantA.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Jewelry::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Jewelry::isProp65WarningRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Jewelry::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Jewelry::smallPartsWarnings\/smallPartsW.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Jewelry::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Jewelry::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Jewelry::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Jewelry::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Jewelry::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Jewelry::certificateNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Certificate Number ==> If the item has a certificate, enter the certificate number here. Separate multiple values by semicolons.

Jewelry::birthstone.walmart_attribute_doc: Birthstone ==> Name of month associated with this gemstone as a birthstone. The format used is: Month- Stone

Jewelry::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Jewelry::claspType.walmart_attribute_doc: Clasp Type ==> If your item has a clasp, then choose a clasp type from the example values. If your value does not exist, enter one of your own.

Jewelry::backFinding.walmart_attribute_doc: Back Finding ==> Kind of hardware used in the "back" of the jewelry, as in the earring back that helps to fasten the earring to the ear. This may be, for example, the earring finding or jewelry backing style.

Jewelry::jewelrySetting.walmart_attribute_doc: Jewelry Setting ==> Method or style in which stones are attached to a piece of jewelry.

Jewelry::earringStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Earring Style ==> Style of earring, as represented by fashion or form. Select from example values; if your value does not exist, enter your own.

Jewelry::earringFeature.walmart_attribute_doc: Earring Feature ==> Features distinct to earring jewelry.

Jewelry::braceletStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Bracelet Style ==> Style of bracelet as expressed by its fashion or form. Choose a value from the example values; if your value does not exist, then enter your own value.

Jewelry::necklaceStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Necklace Style ==> Style of necklace as expressed by fashion or form. Select from the example values; if your value does not exist, enter your own.

Jewelry::chainLength\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Chain Length ==> Enter length of jewelry chain, in inches or feet.

Jewelry::chainLength\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Chain Length ==> Enter length of jewelry chain, in inches or feet.

Jewelry::chainPattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Chain Pattern ==> If pertinent, choose a pattern from the example values; if your value does not exist, then enter one of your own.

Jewelry::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Jewelry::diamondClarity.walmart_attribute_doc: Diamond Clarity ==> Diamond clarity is a quality of diamonds relating to the existence and visual appearance of internal characteristics of a diamond called inclusions, and surface defects called blemishes.

Jewelry::diamondCut.walmart_attribute_doc: Diamond Cut ==> The style or design followed when cutting a diamond. This does not refer to the shape of the diamond, but the pattern of the cut itself.

Jewelry::carats\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone Weight - Carats ==> Measure of the weight (mass) of gemstones and pearls. One carat (ct) is equal to 200 mg.

Jewelry::carats\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone Weight - Carats ==> Measure of the weight (mass) of gemstones and pearls. One carat (ct) is equal to 200 mg.

Jewelry::totalDiamondWeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Diamond Weight ==> Total diamond weight is the combined carat weight of all the diamonds in a piece of jewelry. Paired earrings would be considered a single piece, therefore if each earring contained a diamond with a carat weight of 1/2, the value entered would be 1 ct (2 x 1/2 ct).

Jewelry::totalDiamondWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Diamond Weight ==> Total diamond weight is the combined carat weight of all the diamonds in a piece of jewelry. Paired earrings would be considered a single piece, therefore if each earring contained a diamond with a carat weight of 1/2, the value entered would be 1 ct (2 x 1/2 ct).

Jewelry::totalGemWeight.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Gemstone Weight ==> Total gemstone weight is the combined carat weight of all of the gemstones in a piece of jewelry. Paired earrings would be considered a single piece, therefore if each earring contained a gemstone with a carat weight of 1/2, the value entered would be 1 ct (2 x 1/2 ct). This is a useful indication of gemstone sizes, provided the stones in question are of the same type. Differing types have differing densities so the carat weight will not necessarily provide an accurate indication of size for comparison purposes.

Jewelry::gemstoneCut.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone Cut ==> Type of gemstone cut, as distinct from shape

Jewelry::gemstone.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone ==> The gemstone trade name (i.e., amethyst, not purple quartz).

Jewelry::gemstoneColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone Color ==> The color of the gemstone including factors of hue, tone and saturation. Expressed as a color grade, or descriptors (light rose).

Jewelry::gemstoneClarity.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone Clarity ==> Note that while the clarity rating scale (VVS, VS, etc.) is the same for colored gems as it is for diamonds, the meaning is different: Rating definitions vary based on the type of colored gem. Please refer to the specific ratings definitions for Type 1, Type 2, or Type 3 gems.

Jewelry::stoneCreationMethod.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Creation Method ==> Whether the stone was created by nature or humans

Jewelry::stoneTreatment.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Treatment ==> Describes the process a gemstone has undergone to produce changes in the durability, color, and/or clarity that are beyond the typical gemstone conditioning.

Jewelry::stoneHeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Height ==> The measurement of the height of the stone (vs. the setting) as measured the from the table (top of the stone) to the culet (bottom of the stone).

Jewelry::stoneHeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Height ==> The measurement of the height of the stone (vs. the setting) as measured the from the table (top of the stone) to the culet (bottom of the stone).

Jewelry::stoneLength\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Length ==> The measure of the largest dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer.

Jewelry::stoneLength\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Length ==> The measure of the largest dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer.

Jewelry::stoneWidth\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Width ==> The measure of the narrower dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer.

Jewelry::stoneWidth\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Width ==> The measure of the narrower dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer.

Jewelry::stoneDepthPercentage.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Depth Percentage ==> This is calculated by the following formula: depth / width.

Jewelry::stoneTablePercentage.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Table Percentage ==> In a grading report, table percentage is calculated based on the size of the table divided by the average girdle diameter of the gem. So, a 60 percent table means that the table is 60 percent wide as the gem's outline.

Jewelry::stoneSymmetry.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Symmetry ==> Symmetry refers to the exactness of the shape and placement of the facets. The GIA grades both polish and symmetry and lists it on the certificate using the scale: Excellent, Very Good, Good, Fair and Poor.

Jewelry::stonePolish.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Polish ==> Polish refers to the degree of smoothness of each facet of a gem as measured by a gemologist. When a gem is cut and polished, microscopic surface defects may be created by the polishing wheel as it drags tiny dislodged crystals across the gem's surface.

Jewelry::stoneGirdle.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Girdle ==> The girdle is the thin perimeter of a stone, dividing the crown above from the pavilion below. When viewing a stone in its setting or from a profile view, the girdle is the widest part (or the circumference) of the polished stone - the portion of the stone that makes contact with the setting itself.

Jewelry::stoneCulet.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Culet ==> The culet (pronounced cue-let) is the small area at the bottom of a diamond's pavilion. The culet can be a point or a very small facet sitting parallel to the table.

Jewelry::stoneFluoresence.walmart_attribute_doc: Stone Fluorescence ==> Used to describe the color and strength of the UV light reflected off some diamonds.

Jewelry::pearlType.walmart_attribute_doc: Pearl Type ==> Describes the method for growing pearls and information about the origin of the pearl.

Jewelry::pearlBodyColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Pearl Body Color ==> The color of the pearl's body, vs. the overtone.

Jewelry::pearlLustre.walmart_attribute_doc: Pearl Lustre ==> Measure of the quality and quantity of light that reflects off a pearl.

Jewelry::pearlShape.walmart_attribute_doc: Pearl Shape ==> The shape of the pearl, defined in part by how regular and smooth the surface of the pearl is.

Jewelry::pearlUniformity.walmart_attribute_doc: Pearl Uniformity ==> Describes how well the individual pearls have been matched within a piece of pearl jewelry. Selection factor for quality and appearance, typically applied to pearl-strand necklaces. Values range from Excellent to Poor, depending on the degree of noticeable variations.

Jewelry::pearlSurfaceBlemishes.walmart_attribute_doc: Pearl Surface Blemishes ==> Evaluation of pearls based on the blemishes or irregularities in the pearl’s surface, based on size, number, nature, location, visibility and type of surface characteristics. Values range from Clean to Heavily Spotted.

Jewelry::pearlNacreThickness\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Pearl Nacre Thickness ==> Thickness of the nacre, or iridescent layers which are produced by the mollusk to coat the nucleus of the pearl.

Jewelry::pearlNacreThickness\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Pearl Nacre Thickness ==> Thickness of the nacre, or iridescent layers which are produced by the mollusk to coat the nucleus of the pearl.

Jewelry::pearlStringingMethod.walmart_attribute_doc: Pearl Stringing Method ==> Describes the knotting method and material used in constructing the string of pearls.

Jewelry::sizePerPearl\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Size Per Pearl ==> Diameter of each pearl in millimeters.

Jewelry::sizePerPearl\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Size Per Pearl ==> Diameter of each pearl in millimeters.

Jewelry::numberOfPearls.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pearls ==> Please provide a count of individual pearls on a single item.

Jewelry::inscription.walmart_attribute_doc: Inscription ==> If the item is engraved with an inscription, put the inscription text here.

Jewelry::isResizable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Resizable ==> Indicates that the item is resizable.

Jewelry::ringSizingLowerRange.walmart_attribute_doc: Ring Sizing Lower Range ==> Indicates the smallest size this ring can become if resized. Used with Ring Sizing Upper Range provides total size range if ring is resizable.

Jewelry::ringSizingUpperRange.walmart_attribute_doc: Ring Sizing Upper Range ==> Indicates the largest size this ring can become if resized. Used with Ring Sizing Lower Range provides total size range if ring is resizable.

Jewelry::ringStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Ring Style ==> Form or design of a ring

Jewelry::ringSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Ring Size ==> Standardized numerical sizing of a jewelry ring (based on circumference), as utilized in the United States, Canada and Mexico. Can include quarter and half sizes, depending on which standard is used.

Jewelry::circumference\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Circumference ==> Measurement of a circular object around its perimeter. NOTE: for rings, measurement is taken from the inside of the ring.

Jewelry::circumference\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Circumference ==> Measurement of a circular object around its perimeter. NOTE: for rings, measurement is taken from the inside of the ring.

Jewelry::diameter\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle. NOTE: For rings, the measurement is taken from the inside of the ring.

Jewelry::diameter\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle. NOTE: For rings, the measurement is taken from the inside of the ring.

Jewelry::ringSizeStandard.walmart_attribute_doc: Ring Size Standard ==> One of five major ring-sizing standards.
Jewelry::ringSizeStandard.walmart_attribute_enum: U.S., Canada, Mexico,U.K., Ireland, Australia,China, Japan, South America,India,Italy, Spain, Netherlands, Switzerland,ISO 8653: 1986

Jewelry::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Jewelry::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Jewelry::theme.walmart_attribute_doc: Theme ==> A dominant idea, meaning, or setting applied to an item. Used in a wide range of products including decorative objects, clothing, toys, and furniture. Can be an important selection criteria for consumers who want to achieve a particular ambiance for room décor or for a special occasion.

Jewelry::americanWireGuage.walmart_attribute_doc: American Wire Gauge ==> AWG indicates wire diameter. Both electrical wiring and jewelry piercing industries use AWG to describe product diameters. In the jewelry industry, AWG is used to describe both metallic and non-metallic products.

Jewelry::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

Jewelry::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Jewelry::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Jewelry::isMadeFromRecycledMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Made From Recycled Material ==> Indicates that the item is made from recycled materials.

Jewelry::recycledMaterialContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Recycled Material Content ==> If item contains reused/recycled material, the percentage of all recycled material used to produce the item. This can also include specific material composition; cushions made from 30% recycled cotton fabric. Used to highlight sustainability to the customer.

Jewelry::colorCategory\/colorCategoryVal.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Jewelry::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

Jewelry::bodyParts.walmart_attribute_doc: Body Part ==> The body part/s for which the item is intended.

Jewelry::designer.walmart_attribute_doc: Designer ==> Name of the person who planned the form, look, or workings of the product to be made or built.

Media\/Movies::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Media\/Movies::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesVa.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Media\/Movies::synopsis.walmart_attribute_doc: Synopsis ==> A summary of narrative content.

Media\/Movies::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Media\/Movies::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Media\/Movies::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Media\/Movies::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Media\/Movies::productSecondaryImageURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Media\/Movies::title.walmart_attribute_doc: Title ==> The name given to the work. Does not include any marketing adjectives outside of the given name.

Media\/Movies::physicalMediaFormat.walmart_attribute_doc: Physical Media Format ==> The physical form in which the customer receives the product. For digital file formats use "Digital Audio File Format" (for mp3, aiff, etc), "Digital Video File Format" (for mp4, mov, etc), or "Digital File Format" (for exe, pdf, zip, etc).
Media\/Movies::physicalMediaFormat.walmart_attribute_enum: printed media,USB stick,DVD,Blu-Ray,CD,LP,VHS Tape,miniDV Tape,8-Track Tape,Cassette Tape

Media\/Movies::mpaaRating.walmart_attribute_doc: MPAA Rating ==> The rating provided by the Motion Picture Association of America as a guide to the appropriate age group for a piece of media.

Media\/Movies::ratingReason.walmart_attribute_doc: Rating Reason ==> The reason for the rating of an entertainment product, such as a TV show, Movie, or Musical Album. Reasons for suggesting that content is not appropriate for a general audience include Profanity, Drug Use, Violence, Nudity, and Sexual Content.

Media\/Movies::movieSubgenre.walmart_attribute_doc: Movie Subgenre ==> More specific film subcategory.

Media\/Movies::seriesTitle.walmart_attribute_doc: Series Title ==> If the work is one of multiple works in a series, the title of the series or collection.

Media\/Movies::numberInSeries.walmart_attribute_doc: Number in Series ==> The number in the series, if the work is one of multiple works in a series.

Media\/Movies::director.walmart_attribute_doc: Director ==> Person who receives "Directed by" billing on a film or television show.

Media\/Movies::actors.walmart_attribute_doc: Actors ==> Actors who receive top billing in a movie or television show.

Media\/Movies::screenwriter.walmart_attribute_doc: Screenwriter ==> Person who is credited or billed as the primary writer on a film or television project.

Media\/Movies::studioProductionCompany.walmart_attribute_doc: Studio & Production Company ==> Company that is credited with creation of a film or television show.

Media\/Movies::targetAudience.walmart_attribute_doc: Target Audience ==> The demographic for which the item is targeted.

Media\/Movies::awardsWon.walmart_attribute_doc: Awards Won ==> Use this attribute if the item has won any awards in its particular product category.

Media\/Movies::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

Media\/Movies::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Media\/Movies::variantAttributeNames\/va.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Media\/Movies::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Media\/Movies::theatricalReleaseDate.walmart_attribute_doc: Theatrical Release Date ==> Date that a film was originally released in theaters, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

Media\/Movies::isDubbed.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Dubbed ==> A film or television show is dubbed if there is an audio track that replaces the voices of the original actors with a different language

Media\/Movies::dubbedLanguages.walmart_attribute_doc: Dubbed Languages ==> Language(s) that a film has been dubbed with

Media\/Movies::hasSubtitles.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Subtitles ==> A film or television show has subtitles if there is a transcript or screenplay of the dialog or commentary displayed on the screen.

Media\/Movies::subtitledLanguages.walmart_attribute_doc: Subtitled Languages ==> Language(s) that a film's subtitles have been written in

Media\/Movies::audioTrackCodec.walmart_attribute_doc: Audio Track Codec ==> The compression format or codec for the audio track.

Media\/Movies::aspectRatio.walmart_attribute_doc: Aspect Ratio ==> The proportional relationship between the display's width and its height. Commonly expressed as two numbers separated by a colon.

Media\/Movies::isAdultProduct.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Adult Product ==> Indicates if item is adult in nature and should not appear in results for children's products.

Media\/Movies::originalLanguages.walmart_attribute_doc: Original Languages ==> The original language of the work. Usually this will be one language, but occasionally more than one is appropriate. For example, if a movie is dubbed in English but the original language is Chinese, enter "Chinese."

Media\/Movies::edition.walmart_attribute_doc: Edition ==> The specific edition of the item.

Media\/Movies::numberOfDiscs.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Discs ==> Number of discs included in the item.

Media\/Movies::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Media\/Movies::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Media\/Movies::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

Media\/Movies::autographedBy.walmart_attribute_doc: Autographed by ==> The full name of the person who has autographed this copy.

Media\/Movies::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Media\/Movies::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Media\/TVShows::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Media\/TVShows::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesV.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Media\/TVShows::synopsis.walmart_attribute_doc: Synopsis ==> A summary of narrative content.

Media\/TVShows::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Media\/TVShows::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Media\/TVShows::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Media\/TVShows::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Reasons for suggesting that content is not appropriate for a general audience include Profanity, Drug Use, Violence, Nudity, and Sexual Content.

Media\/TVShows::variantAttributeNames\/v.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Media\/TVShows::dubbedLanguages.walmart_attribute_doc: Dubbed Languages ==> Language(s) that a film has been dubbed with

Media\/TVShows::audioTrackCodec.walmart_attribute_doc: Audio Track Codec ==> The compression format or codec for the audio track.

Media\/TVShows::aspectRatio.walmart_attribute_doc: Aspect Ratio ==> The proportional relationship between the display's width and its height. Commonly expressed as two numbers separated by a colon.

Media\/Music::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesVal.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Media\/Music::synopsis.walmart_attribute_doc: Synopsis ==> A summary of narrative content.

Media\/Music::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Media\/Music::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Media\/Music::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

MusicalInstrument\/MusicCasesAndBags::ma.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

MusicalInstrument\/MusicCasesAndBags::mo.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

MusicalInstrument\/MusicCasesAndBags::mu.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

MusicalInstrument\/MusicCasesAndBags::co.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

MusicalInstrument\/InstrumentAccessories.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.
Instrument ==> The name(s) of the musical instrument(s) or equipment this accessory is intended for/compatible with.
Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.
Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.
Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
