MusicalInstrument\/InstrumentAccessories.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.

Composite Wood Certification Code ==> Composite Wood - Indicates if any portion of the item contains any of the following types of composite wood: hardwood plywood veneer core, hardwood plywood composite core, particleboard, or medium density fiber board (MDF). Enter the code corresponding to the highest formaldehyde emission level on any portion of the item. Code Definitions: 1 - Does not contain composite wood; 7 - Product is not CARB compliant and cannot be sold in California; 8 - Product is CARB compliant and can be sold in California.

Contains Aerosol ==> ‘Aerosol’ is defined by Walmart to include any item of Merchandise that contains a compressed gas or propellant (including bag-on-valve and other pressurized designs). If your product meets this definition, Mark Y and ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.

Contains Chemical ==> ‘Chemical’ is defined by Walmart to include any item of Merchandise that contains a powder, gel, paste, or liquid that is not intended for human consumption. ‘Chemical’ also includes the following types items that ARE intended for human consumption, inhalation, or absorption, or labeled with drug facts: All over-the-counter medications, including: Lozenges, pills or capsules (e.g. pain relievers; allergy medications; as well as vitamins and supplements that contain metals); Medicated swabs and wipes, acne medication, and sunscreen; Medicated patches (such as nicotine patches); Liquids (e.g. cough medicine, medicated drops, nasal spray and inhalers); Medicated shampoos, gums, ointments and creams; Medicated lip balm, lip creams and petroleum jelly; Contraceptive foam, films, and spermicides; and Product/Equipment sold with chemicals (e.g. vaporizer sold with medication) and electronic cigarettes. If your product meets this definition, Mark Y and ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Inputs & Outputs ==> Enter the type and quantity of each input and/or output connection provided on the product.
Display Technology ==> The primary technology used for the item's display.
Wireless Technologies ==> Any wireless communications standard used within or by the item.
Has Bluetooth ==> Does the item provide wireless communication compatibility with the Bluetooth standard?
Is Remote Control Included ==> Is a remote control included with the item?
Battery Life ==> Life of the device's battery under ideal conditions (maximum run time).
Battery Life ==> Life of the device's battery under ideal conditions (maximum run time).
Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.
Is Portable ==> Is the item designed to be easily moved?

Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.
Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.
Autographed by ==> The full name of the person who has autographed this copy.
Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.
Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Funeral::isProp65Wa.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.
Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.
Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.
Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.
Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.
Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.
Occasion ==> The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product.

Holiday Lighting Style ==> Term describing the shape and configuration of decorative lights for special occasions. Used for selection based on use and effect. For example, icicle lights are used decorate tops of windows at during the Christmas holiday season.
Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Theme ==> A dominant idea, meaning, or setting applied to an item. Used in a wide range of products including decorative objects, clothing, toys, and furniture. Can be an important selection criteria for consumers who want to achieve a particular ambiance for room décor or for a special occasion.
Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.
Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.
Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
OccasionAndSeasonal\/DecorationsAndFavor.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

OccasionAndSeasonal\/DecorationsAndFavor.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Expiration ==> Select Yes if product is labeled with any type of expiration or code date that indicates when product should no longer be consumed or no longer at best quality (e.g. Best If Used By, Best By, Use By, etc. ). Some examples of items with expiration dates include food, cleaning supplies, beauty products, etc.

Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.
Is Assembly Required ==> Is product unassembled and must be put together before use?

Assembly Instructions ==> Provide a URL to an image or PDF asset showing assembly instructions for items requiring assembly. URLs must be static and have no query parameters. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// and should end in in the file name.

Light Bulb Type ==> Category of light bulb based on method to produce the light. Important to consumers because each type has different characteristics including bulb life, energy efficiency and color temperature. For example LED bulbs have a greater bulb life than equivalent incandescent bulbs.
Light Bulb Color ==> Color of the bulb, if it needs to be differentiated from a standard light bulb.
Number of Lights ==> Number of lights included in an electrical, home decor, or seasonal decoration.
Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

Watts ==> Number of watts (wattage) of electrical power the product produces or consumes. This attribute is used in a wide variety of products including appliances, light bulbs, electronic equipment and electrical components.

Watts ==> Number of watts (wattage) of electrical power the product produces or consumes. This attribute is used in a wide variety of products including appliances, light bulbs, electronic equipment and electrical components.

Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.
Is Inflatable ==> Indicates that an item can be inflated.

Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.
Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.
Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.
Autographed by ==> The full name of the person who has autographed this copy.
Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.
Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.
Is Animated ==> Indicates that a product has powered, moving parts.
Is Adult Product ==> Indicates if item is adult in nature and should not appear in results for children's products.
Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.
Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).
Swatch Variant Attribute ==> Conditionally Required
Swatch Image URL ==> Conditionally Required

OccasionAndSeasonal\/CeremonialClothingA.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.
Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.
Occasion ==> The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product.

Clothing Size ==> Clothing size as it appears on the garment label. Use this attribute for general sizes (S, M, L) as well as general numbered sizes (2, 4, 6, etc). For items that have unique sizes (dress shirts, bras, etc.) use the specific size attribute.
Clothing Size Group ==> The common sizing groups used by the retail clothing industry.

Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.
Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.
Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.
Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Swatch Image URL ==> Conditionally Required

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::ingredien.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::hasBatter.walmart_attribute_doc: Contains Batteries ==> "Battery or battery containing product" is defined by Company to include any item of Merchandise that is a battery or any component of Merchandise, including reusable packaging intended to stay in use with the item, containing a battery of any chemistry/ type. Mark Y if this definition applies to your product.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::batteryTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::batteryTe.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::isAerosol.walmart_attribute_doc: Contains Aerosol ==> ‘Aerosol’ is defined by Walmart to include any item of Merchandise that contains a compressed gas or propellant (including bag-on-valve and other pressurized designs). If your product meets this definition, Mark Y and ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::requiresT.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::countryOf.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::fabricCon.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::fabricCar.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::recommend.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::wigStyles.walmart_attribute_doc: Wig Style ==> Descriptive terms for wig styles.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/Costumes::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

OccasionAndSeasonal\/GiftSupplyAndAwards.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.
Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.
Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.
Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.
Occasion ==> The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product.
Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)
Target Audience ==> The demographic for which the item is targeted.

Theme ==> A dominant idea, meaning, or setting applied to an item. Used in a wide range of products including decorative objects, clothing, toys, and furniture. Can be an important selection criteria for consumers who want to achieve a particular ambiance for room décor or for a special occasion.
Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.
Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Contains Batteries ==> "Battery or battery containing product" is defined by Company to include any item of Merchandise that is a battery or any component of Merchandise, including reusable packaging intended to stay in use with the item, containing a battery of any chemistry/ type. Mark Y if this definition applies to your product.

Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
OccasionAndSeasonal\/GiftSupplyAndAwards.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

OccasionAndSeasonal\/GiftSupplyAndAwards.walmart_attribute_doc: Contains Aerosol ==> ‘Aerosol’ is defined by Walmart to include any item of Merchandise that contains a compressed gas or propellant (including bag-on-valve and other pressurized designs). If your product meets this definition, Mark Y and ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Is Assembly Required ==> Is product unassembled and must be put together before use?

Assembly Instructions ==> Provide a URL to an image or PDF asset showing assembly instructions for items requiring assembly. URLs must be static and have no query parameters. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// and should end in in the file name.

Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.
Sport ==> If the product is sports-related, the name of the specific sport depicted on the product, or the target sport for the product use
Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.
Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.
Swatch Variant Attribute ==> Conditionally Required
Swatch Image URL ==> Conditionally Required

Office::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Office::hasExpiration.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Expiration ==> Select Yes if product is labeled with any type of expiration or code date that indicates when product should no longer be consumed or no longer at best quality (e.g. Best If Used By, Best By, Use By, etc. ). Some examples of items with expiration dates include food, cleaning supplies, beauty products, etc.

Office::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Office::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Office::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Office::isLightingFactsLabelRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Lighting Facts Label Required ==> Does your item require a Lighting Facts label? A Lighting Facts label must appear on packaging for most general service "lamps" with medium screw bases. That includes most incandescent, compact fluorescent (CFL), and light emitting diode (LED) light bulbs. For more information on what items are covered, see 16 CFR § 305.2 and § 305.3.

Office::lightingFactsLabel.walmart_attribute_doc: Lighting Facts ==> URL of the location of the label. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// Label must include brightness specified lumens, estimated energy cost per year, life, light appearance, scale, energy used, and special handling information needed for disposal, as outlined by the FTC. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Office::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Office::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

Office::theme.walmart_attribute_doc: Theme ==> A dominant idea, meaning, or setting applied to an item. Used in a wide range of products including decorative objects, clothing, toys, and furniture. Can be an important selection criteria for consumers who want to achieve a particular ambiance for room décor or for a special occasion.

Office::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Office::compatibleDevices.walmart_attribute_doc: Compatible Devices ==> A list of the devices compatible with the item.

Office::isPowered.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Powered ==> Y indicates that an item uses electricity, requiring a power cord or batteries to operate. Useful for items that have non-powered equivalents (e.g. toothbrushes).

Office::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

Office::brightness\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Brightness ==> Brightness per bulb measured in lumens.

Office::brightness\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Brightness ==> Brightness per bulb measured in lumens.

Office::dexterity.walmart_attribute_doc: Dexterity ==> Indicates whether the item is designed to be used by the right or left hand.

Office::systemOfMeasurement.walmart_attribute_doc: System of Measurement ==> Name of the standard for a collection of units of measure that is used in for item. If appropriate, more than one measurement system can be entered. Example: Metric, and SEA for a set of wrenches that has both metric sockets and SEA sockets.

Office::holeSize\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Hole Size ==> Indicates hole size in inches for paper, paper punches, and other paper products.

Office::holeSize\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Hole Size ==> Indicates hole size in inches for paper, paper punches, and other paper products.

Office::year.walmart_attribute_doc: Year ==> Indicates the calendar year used for the item.

Office::calendarFormat.walmart_attribute_doc: Calendar Format ==> Indicates what period of time the calendar uses.

Office::calendarTerm\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Calendar Term ==> Indicates the length of time covered by the calendar.

Office::calendarTerm\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Calendar Term ==> Indicates the length of time covered by the calendar.

Office::numberOfSheets.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Sheets ==> Indicates the number of paper sheets in items, like pads of paper. Also the number of sheets an office instrument can hold, such as paper punches or paper trays.

Office::envelopeSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Envelope Size ==> The dimensions of the envelope, using ISO 269 or standard North American sizes.

Office::inkColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Ink Color ==> The ink color of pens, markers, ink pads, and other writing implements.

Office::isRefillable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Refillable ==> Indicates that the item is available in a container that is intended to be refilled and used again.

Office::isRetractable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Retractable ==> Indicates that the item can be withdrawn into a holder, as in a cord or leash.

Office::isIndustrial.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Industrial ==> Indicates that an item can be used in an industrial setting or has an industrial application.

Office::isAntiglare.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Antiglare ==> Y indicates the item has been specifically designed or treated to reduce the unwanted reflection of light from the sun or strong, internal lighting. Examples include screen protectors that have an anti-glare coating, and polarized sunglasses.

Office::isMagnetic.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Magnetic ==> Y indicates the item has been designed to attract items made out of iron or steel, or is capable of holding magnets. Examples include a screwdriver with a magnetic tip, and a dry erase board that can accommodate magnetic pen holders.

Office::isTearResistant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Tear-Resistant ==> Selecting Y indicates the item has a material that is specifically designed or treated to withstand the effects of tearing. Important to consumers for a wide variety of products including mailing envelopes, garbage bags and pet bed covers.

Office::recommendedUses.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

Office::hpprintercartridgeNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: HP Printer Cartridge Number ==> For HP ink and toner cartridges made after 2007.

Office::pencilLeadDiameter\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Pencil Lead Diameter ==> Pencil lead size is the diameter of a pencil lead, usually measured in millimeters. Used mostly in mechanical pencils.

Office::pencilLeadDiameter\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Pencil Lead Diameter ==> Pencil lead size is the diameter of a pencil lead, usually measured in millimeters. Used mostly in mechanical pencils.

Office::tabCut.walmart_attribute_doc: Tab Cut ==> Describes the style and position of a file folder tab.
Office::tabCut.walmart_attribute_enum: 1/3 cut,1/5 cut,2/5 cut - right of center,2/5 cut - right position,1/2 cut,undercut

Office::tabColor.walmart_attribute_doc: Tab Color ==> The color of the tab portion of a file folder or divider.

Office::isMadeFromRecycledMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Made From Recycled Material ==> Indicates that the item is made from recycled materials.

Office::isLined.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Lined ==> Indicates if the item contains a material lining on the interior.

Office::recycledMaterialContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Recycled Material Content ==> If item contains reused/recycled material, the percentage of all recycled material used to produce the item. This can also include specific material composition; cushions made from 30% recycled cotton fabric. Used to highlight sustainability to the customer.

Office::overallExpansion\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Overall Expansion ==> The overall expansion capacity of a file jacket or folder, expressed in inches.

Office::overallExpansion\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Overall Expansion ==> The overall expansion capacity of a file jacket or folder, expressed in inches.

Office::paperClipSize.walmart_attribute_doc: Paper Clip Size ==> Paper clip size indicates the length of the paperclip and is expressed either as Jumbo or No. 1, No. 2, or No. 3.

Office::penPointSize\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Pen Point Size ==> The size of the pen's point based on the thickness of the line it leaves when rolled across paper, expressed in mm.

Office::penPointSize\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Pen Point Size ==> The size of the pen's point based on the thickness of the line it leaves when rolled across paper, expressed in mm.

Other\/Storage::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Other\/Storage::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesV.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Other\/Storage::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Other\/Storage::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Other\/Storage::manufacturerPartNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Other\/Storage::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Other\/Storage::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Other\/Storage::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Other\/Storage::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Other\/Storage::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Other\/Storage::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other\/Storage::productSecondaryImageURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other\/Storage::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

Other\/Storage::finish.walmart_attribute_doc: Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.

Other\/Storage::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Other\/Storage::colorCategory\/colorCate.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Other\/Storage::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Other\/Storage::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

Other\/Storage::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

Other\/Storage::recommendedRooms.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Rooms ==> The rooms where the item is likely or recommended to be used.

Other\/Storage::recommendedLocations.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Locations ==> The primary location recommended for the item's use.

Other\/Storage::assembledProductLength\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other\/Storage::assembledProductWidth\/m.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other\/Storage::assembledProductWidth\/u.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other\/Storage::assembledProductHeight\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other\/Storage::assembledProductWeight\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other\/Storage::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Other\/Storage::variantAttributeNames\/v.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Other\/Storage::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Other\/Storage::isProp65WarningRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Other\/Storage::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Other\/Storage::smallPartsWarnings\/smal.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Other\/Storage::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Other\/Storage::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Other\/Storage::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Other\/Storage::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Other\/Storage::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Other\/Storage::isAssemblyRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Assembly Required ==> Is product unassembled and must be put together before use?

Other\/Storage::assemblyInstructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembly Instructions ==> Provide a URL to an image or PDF asset showing assembly instructions for items requiring assembly. URLs must be static and have no query parameters. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// and should end in in the file name.

Other\/Storage::fabricContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Other\/Storage::fabricCareInstructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Care Instructions ==> Describes how the fabric should be cleaned. Enter details of the fabric care label found on the item. (For garments, typically located inside on the top of the back or the lower left side.)

Other\/Storage::collection.walmart_attribute_doc: Collection ==> A collection is a particular group of items that have the same visual style, made by the same brand.

Other\/Storage::numberOfShelves.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Shelves ==> The number of shelves included in the furniture or storage unit.

Other\/Storage::shelfStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Shelf Style ==> Describes the structure or style of a shelving unit.

Other\/Storage::shelfDepth\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Shelf Depth ==> Depth of shelf in inches.

Other\/Storage::shelfDepth\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Shelf Depth ==> Depth of shelf in inches.

Other\/Storage::numberOfDrawers.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Drawers ==> The number of drawers included the furniture or storage unit.

Other\/Storage::drawerPosition.walmart_attribute_doc: Drawer Position ==> The location of the drawer in relation to the storage unit.

Other\/Storage::drawerDimensions.walmart_attribute_doc: Drawer Dimensions ==> The height, width and depth measurements of drawers contained in this item, given in the format H" x W" x D".

Other\/Storage::capacity.walmart_attribute_doc: Capacity ==> A product's available space. Capacity is often provided for items that contain multiple pieces of something or that can accommodate some number of objects.

Other\/Storage::maximumWeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Weight ==> The upper weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Minimum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Minimum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Other\/Storage::maximumWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Weight ==> The upper weight limit or capability of an item, often used in conjunction with "Minimum Weight". The meaning varies with context of product. For example, when used with "Minimum Weight", this attribute provides weight ranges for a range of products including pet medicine, baby carriers and outdoor play structures.

Other\/Storage::recommendedUses.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

Other\/Storage::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Other\/Storage::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Other\/Storage::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Other\/Storage::isFoldable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Foldable ==> Indicates that an item can be folded.

Other\/Storage::isRetractable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Retractable ==> Indicates that the item can be withdrawn into a holder, as in a cord or leash.

Other\/Storage::isPortable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Portable ==> Is the item designed to be easily moved?

Other\/Storage::isIndustrial.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Industrial ==> Indicates that an item can be used in an industrial setting or has an industrial application.

Other\/Storage::systemOfMeasurement.walmart_attribute_doc: System of Measurement ==> Name of the standard for a collection of units of measure that is used in for item. If appropriate, more than one measurement system can be entered. Example: Metric, and SEA for a set of wrenches that has both metric sockets and SEA sockets.

Other\/giftCards::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other\/giftCards::productSecondaryImageU.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other\/giftCards::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Other\/giftCards::variantAttributeNames\.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Other\/giftCards::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Other\/giftCards::giftCardFormat.walmart_attribute_doc: Gift Card Format ==> Is the gift card physical, or an electronic/e-card?

Other\/giftCards::giftCardCategory\/gift.walmart_attribute_doc: Gift Card Category ==> A category describing how the gift card will be used.

Other\/giftCards::giftCardAmount.walmart_attribute_doc: Gift Card Amount ==> Face amount of the gift card, not including extra fees.

Other\/giftCards::occasion.walmart_attribute_doc: Occasion ==> The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product.

Other\/giftCards::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Other\/giftCards::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Other\/giftCards::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Other\/giftCards::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

Other\/giftCards::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Other\/giftCards::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Other\/giftCards::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::productSecon.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::recommendedS.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Surfaces ==> The surfaces that a product is marketed for, or meant to be compatible with.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::recommendedR.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Rooms ==> The rooms where the item is likely or recommended to be used.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::recommendedL.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Locations ==> The primary location recommended for the item's use.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::finish.walmart_attribute_doc: Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::colorCategor.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::isAssemblyRe.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Assembly Required ==> Is product unassembled and must be put together before use?

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::assemblyInst.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembly Instructions ==> Provide a URL to an image or PDF asset showing assembly instructions for items requiring assembly. URLs must be static and have no query parameters. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// and should end in in the file name.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::assembledPro.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
