Other\/CleaningAndChemical::variantGroup.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::variantAttri.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::isPrimaryVar.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::isProp65Warn.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::prop65Warnin.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::batteryTechn.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Other\/CleaningAndChemical::batteryTechn.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::hasExpiratio.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Expiration ==> Select Yes if product is labeled with any type of expiration or code date that indicates when product should no longer be consumed or no longer at best quality (e.g. Best If Used By, Best By, Use By, etc. ). Some examples of items with expiration dates include food, cleaning supplies, beauty products, etc.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::hasPricePerU.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Price Per Unit ==> Mark as "Y" if your item is any of the following: food used for human or domestic animal consumption; ingredients added to food; napkins; tissues; toilet paper; foil, plastic wrap, wax paper, parchment paper; paper towels; disposable plates, bowls, and cutlery; detergents, soaps, waxes, and other cleansing agents; non-prescription drugs, female hygeine products, and toiletries; automotive fluids and cleaners; rock salt; diapers, pullups and swimmers; fertilizer; kitty litter.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::pricePerUnit.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Unit of Measure ==> The units that will be used to calculate the "Price Per Unit" for your product. For example, a gallon of milk has a "PPU Unit of Measure" of Fluid Ounces. NOTE: This may not be the Unit of Measure on the label.
PPU Quantity of Units ==> Enter the quantity of units for the item, based on the "PPU Unit of Measure" you selected. For example, a gallon of milk should be 128. NOTE: Do not enter the price.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::hasIngredien.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::ingredientLi.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::ingredients.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::hasFuelConta.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::fabricConten.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::isPowered.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Powered ==> Y indicates that an item uses electricity, requiring a power cord or batteries to operate. Useful for items that have non-powered equivalents (e.g. toothbrushes).

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::volts\/measu.walmart_attribute_doc: Volts ==> Number of volts the product produces or requires. The significance of voltage varies with type of product. For example, if product is an appliance, used to describe the outlet voltage required. If an item (such as a power supply) both produces and requires different voltages, each type of voltage should be included.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::volts\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Volts ==> Number of volts the product produces or requires. The significance of voltage varies with type of product. For example, if product is an appliance, used to describe the outlet voltage required. If an item (such as a power supply) both produces and requires different voltages, each type of voltage should be included.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::connections.walmart_attribute_doc: Connector Type ==> The standardized connections provided on the item.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::activeIngred.walmart_attribute_doc: Active Ingredients ==> The list of active ingredients in order of potency, as shown on the item label.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::inactiveIngr.walmart_attribute_doc: Inactive Ingredients ==> The list of inactive ingredients in order of potency, as shown on the item label.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::instructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Instructions ==> Detailed information telling how the product should be operated or assembled.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::form.walmart_attribute_doc: Form ==> Describes the way the item is dispensed or consumed, including its texture or other physical characteristics.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::scent.walmart_attribute_doc: Scent ==> Descriptive term for fragrance labeled on the product, if any. "Unscented" is a scent, if labeled. If no scent is specifically labeled, leave blank.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::fluidOunces\.walmart_attribute_doc: Fluid Ounces ==> Number of liquid ounces of the product in the individual container. Used for products such as cleaning supplies and automotive care products.
Fluid Ounces ==> Number of liquid ounces of the product in the individual container. Used for products such as cleaning supplies and automotive care products.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::isRecyclable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Recyclable ==> Recycle is the act of processing used or abandoned materials for use in creating new products or capable of being used again.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::isFlammable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Flammable ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to resist burning under certain conditions, as specified by the manufacturer. An important feature for products such as fire blankets, building materials, and safes.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::isCombustibl.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Combustible ==> Y indicates the manufacturer has specified that the substance (usually a liquid) is combustible and has the potential to ignite. Combustible items have a flash point between 100-200 degrees F and pose a potential safety hazard. Examples of products that are classified as flammable include some paints, solvents, and petroleum products. Note: If product is labeled as Flammable (has a flashpoint of less than 100 degrees F) item should be identified as Flammable vs. Combustible.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::isBiodegrada.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Biodegradable ==> Y indicates the product is specifically manufactured to have the capability of decomposed by bacteria or other living organisms. Used to identify this characteristic as a feature. Examples of products that have biodegradable versions include paint thinners and cleaning solvents.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::isEnergyStar.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Energy Star-Certified ==> Indicate Y if the product has been certified by the EPA Energy Star program.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::handleLength.walmart_attribute_doc: Handle Length ==> Length of the handle, measured in inches.
Handle Length ==> Length of the handle, measured in inches.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::bladeWidth.walmart_attribute_doc: Blade Width ==> The width of a blade of a cutting or wiping tool (saws, squeegees). How the measurement is taken can vary with the product.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::bristleMater.walmart_attribute_doc: Bristle Material ==> Material of the bristle portion of a brush

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::cleaningPath.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning Path ==> The width measurement of the cleaning path that the machine creates per pass. Typically applied to vacuum cleaners, carpet cleaning machines and floor polishers.
Cleaning Path ==> The width measurement of the cleaning path that the machine creates per pass. Typically applied to vacuum cleaners, carpet cleaning machines and floor polishers.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Other\/CleaningAndChemical::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::shortDescript.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::keyFeatures/k.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::manufacturerP.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::multipackQuan.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::smallPartsWar.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Other\/safetyAndEmergency::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::keyFeatures/k.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::manufacturerP.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::multipackQuan.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::productSecond.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::fuelType.walmart_attribute_doc: Fuel Type ==> The kind of material that a product consumes to produce heat or power. Attribute is also used to classify a fuel product.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::fluidOunces\/.walmart_attribute_doc: Fluid Ounces ==> Number of liquid ounces of the product in the individual container. Used for products such as cleaning supplies and automotive care products.
Fluid Ounces ==> Number of liquid ounces of the product in the individual container. Used for products such as cleaning supplies and automotive care products.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::recommendedUs.walmart_attribute_doc: Recommended Use ==> Further clarification of what the item may be used for. This improves searchability when customers search for general terms like "birthday party" that do not include the names of specific items.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::variantGroupI.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::variantAttrib.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::isPrimaryVari.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::isProp65Warni.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::prop65Warning.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::hasExpiration.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Expiration ==> Select Yes if product is labeled with any type of expiration or code date that indicates when product should no longer be consumed or no longer at best quality (e.g. Best If Used By, Best By, Use By, etc. ). Some examples of items with expiration dates include food, cleaning supplies, beauty products, etc.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::hasPricePerUn.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Price Per Unit ==> Mark as "Y" if your item is any of the following: food used for human or domestic animal consumption; ingredients added to food; napkins; tissues; toilet paper; foil, plastic wrap, wax paper, parchment paper; paper towels; disposable plates, bowls, and cutlery; detergents, soaps, waxes, and other cleansing agents; non-prescription drugs, female hygeine products, and toiletries; automotive fluids and cleaners; rock salt; diapers, pullups and swimmers; fertilizer; kitty litter.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::pricePerUnitU.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Unit of Measure ==> The units that will be used to calculate the "Price Per Unit" for your product. For example, a gallon of milk has a "PPU Unit of Measure" of Fluid Ounces. NOTE: This may not be the Unit of Measure on the label.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::pricePerUnitQ.walmart_attribute_doc: PPU Quantity of Units ==> Enter the quantity of units for the item, based on the "PPU Unit of Measure" you selected. For example, a gallon of milk should be 128. NOTE: Do not enter the price.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::instructions.walmart_attribute_doc: Instructions ==> Detailed information telling how the product should be operated or assembled.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::form.walmart_attribute_doc: Form ==> Describes the way the item is dispensed or consumed, including its texture or other physical characteristics.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::isEnergyStarC.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Energy Star-Certified ==> Indicate Y if the product has been certified by the EPA Energy Star program.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::isRefillable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Refillable ==> Indicates that the item is available in a container that is intended to be refilled and used again.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Other\/fuelsAndLubricants::systemOfMeasu.walmart_attribute_doc: System of Measurement ==> Name of the standard for a collection of units of measure that is used in for item. If appropriate, more than one measurement system can be entered. Example: Metric, and SEA for a set of wrenches that has both metric sockets and SEA sockets.

Other::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Other::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Other::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

Other::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other::productSecondaryImageURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Other::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

Other::finish.walmart_attribute_doc: Finish ==> Terms describing the overall external treatment applied to the item. Typically finishes give a distinct appearance, texture or additional performance to the item. This attribute is used in a wide variety products and materials including wood, metal and fabric.

Other::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Other::colorCategory\/colorCategoryValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Other::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Other::shape.walmart_attribute_doc: Shape ==> Physical shape of the item. Used in a wide variety of products including rugs, toys and large appliances.

Other::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

Other::assembledProductLength\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other::assembledProductLength\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other::assembledProductWidth\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other::assembledProductWidth\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other::assembledProductHeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other::assembledProductHeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other::assembledProductWeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other::assembledProductWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Other::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Other::variantAttributeNames\/variantAtt.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Other::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Other::isProp65WarningRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Other::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Other::smallPartsWarnings\/smallPartsWar.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Other::hasIngredientList.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Ingredient List ==> Does your product have a list of ingredients OTHER than that provided with Drug Facts, Nutrition Facts, or Supplement Facts? If so, please provide EITHER the ingredients text or the URL to the image.

Other::ingredientListImage.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredient List Image ==> If your product contains a list of ingredients OTHER than that required with drug, supplement, or nutrition info, provide the URL of image. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB.

Other::ingredients.walmart_attribute_doc: Ingredients Text ==> The list of all ingredients contained in an item, as found on the product label mandated by FDA guidelines. The ingredients should be listed in descending order by weight. The label must list the names of any FDA-certified color additives, but some ingredients can be listed collectively as flavors, spices, artificial flavoring or artificial colors. Refer to the FDA Food Labeling Guide for more guidelines.

Other::hasFuelContainer.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

Other::requiresTextileActLabeling.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Other::countryOfOriginTextiles.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

Other::isFoldable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Foldable ==> Indicates that an item can be folded.

Other::isRetractable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Retractable ==> Indicates that the item can be withdrawn into a holder, as in a cord or leash.

Other::isPortable.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Portable ==> Is the item designed to be easily moved?

Other::isIndustrial.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Industrial ==> Indicates that an item can be used in an industrial setting or has an industrial application.

If appropriate, more than one measurement system can be entered. Example: Metric, and SEA for a set of wrenches that has both metric sockets and SEA sockets.

Other::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::numberOfM.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Megapixels ==> The resolution at which this item records images.
Number of Megapixels ==> The resolution at which this item records images.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::digitalZo.walmart_attribute_doc: Digital Zoom ==> Measure of the magnification power provided by a feature that electronically enlarges the image area at the center of the frame, trims away the outside edges of the picture, and interpolates the result to the pixel dimensions of the original. Important to consumers because digital zoom reduces the image resolution and the image quality vs. optical zoom, which does not affect the quality of the zoomed image.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::opticalZo.walmart_attribute_doc: Optical Zoom ==> Measure of the magnification power of a physical optical zoom lens. For example, a camera with an optical zoom of 4x allows the users to magnify image up to 4x larger. Important to consumers because optical zoom results in better image quality than zoom that is digitally generated.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::magnifica.walmart_attribute_doc: Magnification ==> Number expressing a ratio of how much a device’s optical system can increase (or decrease) an image as compared to the true size. Typically applied to products such as magnifying lenses and microscopes and expressed as a number followed by an x.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::sensorRes.walmart_attribute_doc: Sensor Resolution ==> One specification describing the smallest detectable incremental change of input parameter that can be detected in the output signal. Expressed either as a proportion of the full-scale reading, or as an absolute. Used for a variety of sensor types and importance varies with product. For example for digital cameras, image sensor resolution is an important factor for image quality.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::lensDiame.walmart_attribute_doc: Lens Diameter ==> Measurement of the diameter of the front portion of the lens, measured in mm. For cameras, important factor to fit accessories such as filters.
Lens Diameter ==> Measurement of the diameter of the front portion of the lens, measured in mm. For cameras, important factor to fit accessories such as filters.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::lensCoati.walmart_attribute_doc: Lens Coating ==> Type of thin layer of material applied to the surface of lenses or other optical elements that provide specific effects. Usually applied to components such as camera lenses to improve resistance to scratches, or provide a mirror effect for sunglasses.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::lensFilte.walmart_attribute_doc: Lens Filter Type ==> Terms describing the kind of filter attached to a lens. Typically camera lens filters affect the amount and type of light that enters the lens.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::cameraLen.walmart_attribute_doc: Camera Lens Features ==> Description of the lens' focal length, optical characteristics or special features.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::hasFlash.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Flash ==> Y indicates the device incorporates a camera flash.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::flashType.walmart_attribute_doc: Flash Type ==> The structure of an artificial light unit that a camera includes or can accommodate.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::minimumSh.walmart_attribute_doc: Minimum Shutter Speed ==> Measured in seconds.
Minimum Shutter Speed ==> Measured in seconds.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::maximumSh.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Shutter Speed ==> Measured in seconds.
Maximum Shutter Speed ==> Measured in seconds.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::focusType.walmart_attribute_doc: Focus Type ==> Terms that describe modes, mechanisms, or control arrangements that adjust optical focus on the device. For example, if item is a pair of binoculars, focus type would describe weather the lenses on binoculars can be adjusted independently of one another.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::focalLeng.walmart_attribute_doc: Focal Length ==> On a camera or lens, the distance between the image sensor and the lens when the subject is in focus, usually stated as a range in millimeters.
Focal Length ==> On a camera or lens, the distance between the image sensor and the lens when the subject is in focus, usually stated as a range in millimeters.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::focalRati.walmart_attribute_doc: Focal Ratio ==> Ratio of the lens's focal length, to the diameter of the entrance pupil (optical image of the physical aperture stop, as 'seen' through the front of the lens system). Also known as the f-number or f-stop, this number indicates lens speed, an important selection criteria based on intended photographic use.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::minimumAp.walmart_attribute_doc: Minimum Aperture ==> The smallest aperture this item accommodates, indicating the how much light can pass through the lens and typically expressed in f-numbers.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::maximumAp.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Aperture ==> Size of the largest aperture this item accommodates. For products such as cameras, this is the f-stop (f-number) of the widest opening the lens mechanism can produce. Important selection factor for consumers who look for a low f/stop value. This indicates more light can enter the lens and allow a faster shutter speed; especially in low light conditions.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::exposureM.walmart_attribute_doc: Exposure Modes ==> Available settings to control shutter speed and lens aperture.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::displayTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Display Technology ==> The primary technology used for the item's display.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::displayRe.walmart_attribute_doc: Display Resolution ==> If the item has a screen display, the resolution value of the screen component of the product. Typically measured as the number of pixels creating the display expressed as number of columns x number of rows. For example, a digital camera's screen resolution (vs. the image quality the camera can produce) of 640x480.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::screenSiz.walmart_attribute_doc: Screen Size ==> Typically measured on the diagonal in inches.
Screen Size ==> Typically measured on the diagonal in inches.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::diameter\.walmart_attribute_doc: Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.
Diameter ==> The measurement from one side of a circle to the other, through the middle.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::colorCate.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::assembled.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::variantGr.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::variantAt.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::isPrimary.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::isProp65W.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::prop65War.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::batteryTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::batteryTe.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::isAssembl.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Assembly Required ==> Is product unassembled and must be put together before use?

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::assemblyI.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembly Instructions ==> Provide a URL to an image or PDF asset showing assembly instructions for items requiring assembly. URLs must be static and have no query parameters. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// and should end in in the file name.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::hasWarran.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::warrantyU.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::warrantyT.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::accessori.walmart_attribute_doc: Accessories Included ==> Listing of any supplementary items that come with the product. Important information for consumers because accessories typically provide additional convenience, utility, attractiveness or safety to or for a product.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::hasTouchs.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Touchscreen ==> Does the display have touchscreen capabilities?

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::hasMemory.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Memory Card Slot ==> Y indicates the item has a place to insert electronic memory data storage device used to record digital information.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::memoryCar.walmart_attribute_doc: Memory Card Format ==> The memory card format applicable to the product.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::recordabl.walmart_attribute_doc: Recordable Media Formats ==> The recording technologies compatible with the item.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::wirelessT.walmart_attribute_doc: Wireless Technologies ==> Any wireless communications standard used within or by the item.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::connectio.walmart_attribute_doc: Connector Type ==> The standardized connections provided on the item.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::isPortabl.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Portable ==> Is the item designed to be easily moved?

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::isWaterpr.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::hasSelfTi.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Self-Timer ==> Y indicates the device has a feature that allows a countdown, or a timed delay before taking an action, such as taking a photo.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::selfTimer.walmart_attribute_doc: Self-Timer Delay ==> Length of time the self-timer will allow before it takes an action, such as taking a photo.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::standbyTi.walmart_attribute_doc: Standby Time ==> The number of continuous hours the device may remain in standby mode before shutting down.
Standby Time ==> The number of continuous hours the device may remain in standby mode before shutting down.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::fieldOfVi.walmart_attribute_doc: Field of View ==> Measure of the area that can be seen through a lens of an item, as specified by the manufacturer. Attribute applied to such products as microscopes, telescopes and rifle scopes. Can be expressed as the angular field of view (in degrees) or the true field of view (in feet).

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::isParfoca.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Parfocal ==> Y indicates the item has a lens that stays in focus when magnification/focal length is changed. For example, a microscope that stays in focus when the microscope objective is rotated.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::shootingM.walmart_attribute_doc: Shooting Mode ==> Available settings designed to accommodate different photographic situations.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::microphon.walmart_attribute_doc: Microphone Included ==> Y indicates the item contains a microphone to record sound, either internally or externally.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::hasHandle.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Handle ==> Y indicates the item contains a grip to make the item easier to hold, carry, or control.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::isMultico.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Multicoated ==> Y indicates the item has a series of layers of coatings; For example, eye glasses that have layers of anti-reflective coatings.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::hasRedEye.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Red Eye Reduction ==> Y indicates the item has a feature to reduce the appearance of red pupils in photos due to the red-eye effect.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::hasNightV.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Night Vision ==> Does this device have features that give users the ability to see in low light conditions?

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::isFogResi.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Fog-Resistant ==> Has this product been treated to prevent the condensation of water on its surface?

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::attachmen.walmart_attribute_doc: Attachment Style ==> Description of how the product is able to attach to other surfaces or items. Also used for product fit. For example, bayonet is an attachment style describing how a camera lens attaches to the camera body

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::hasShould.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Shoulder Strap ==> Y indicates the item comes with a strap that allows a user to suspend the item from the shoulders.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::compatibl.walmart_attribute_doc: Compatible Brands ==> A list of the brands most commonly compatible with the item.
Compatible Devices ==> A list of the devices compatible with the item.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::cleaningC.walmart_attribute_doc: Cleaning, Care & Maintenance ==> Description of how the item should be cleaned and maintained.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::globalBra.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Photography\/CamerasAndLenses::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::shortDesc.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::keyFeatur.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::manufactu.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::modelNumb.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::multipack.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::countPerP.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::mainImage.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::productSe.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Photography\/PhotoAccessories::lightOutp.walmart_attribute_doc: Light Output ==> The amount of visible light emitted by a source, measured in lumens.

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::lightBulb.walmart_attribute_doc: Light Bulb Type ==> Category of light bulb based on method to produce the light. Important to consumers because each type has different characteristics including bulb life, energy efficiency and color temperature. For example LED bulbs have a greater bulb life than equivalent incandescent bulbs.

Photography\/PhotoAccessories::volts\/me.walmart_attribute_doc: Volts ==> Number of volts the product produces or requires. The significance of voltage varies with type of product. For example, if product is an appliance, used to describe the outlet voltage required. If an item (such as a power supply) both produces and requires different voltages, each type of voltage should be included.

(3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::countPerPac.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::pieceCount.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Pieces ==> The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits). EXAMPLE: (1) A 500-piece puzzle has a "Piece Count" of 500. (2) A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a piece count of "105." (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Piece Count" of 5.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::mainImageUr.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::productSeco.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::colorCatego.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::ageGroup\/a.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::ageRange.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Range ==> Minimum and Maximum Ages for a product. Note: Both Min. and Max. attributes will be the same Unit of Measure: Months, or Years.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::sport.walmart_attribute_doc: Sport ==> If the product is sports-related, the name of the specific sport depicted on the product, or the target sport for the product use

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::bicycleFram.walmart_attribute_doc: Bicycle Frame Size ==> Measurement of the bicycle frame in inches.
Bicycle Frame Size ==> Measurement of the bicycle frame in inches.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::bicycleWhee.walmart_attribute_doc: Bicycle Wheel Diameter ==> Measurement of the diameter of a bicycle tire or tube, in inches.
Bicycle Wheel Diameter ==> Measurement of the diameter of a bicycle tire or tube, in inches.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::bicycleTire.walmart_attribute_doc: Bicycle Tire Size ==> Measurement of bicycle tire, expressed in diameter x width, either inch or decimal systems

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::numberOfSpe.walmart_attribute_doc: Number of Speeds ==> A number describing the gear arrangements on the bicycle that enable a rider to make it easier or harder to pedal. Typically, the number of gears on the front wheel multiplied by the number of gears on the back wheel. Fixed gear bicycles are 1 speed.

SportAndRecreation\/Cycling::assembledPr.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
