Vehicle\/VehicleOther::batteryTechnology.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::hasFuelContainer.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Fuel Container ==> Denotes any item with an empty container that may be filled with fluids, such as fuel, CO2, propane, etc.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::requiresTextileAc.walmart_attribute_doc: Requires Textile Act Labeling ==> Select "Y" if your item contains wool or is one of the following: clothing (except for hats and shoes), handkerchiefs, scarves, bedding (including sheets, covers, blankets, comforters, pillows, pillowcases, quilts, bedspreads and pads (but not outer coverings for mattresses or box springs)), curtains and casements, draperies, tablecloths, napkins, doilies, floor coverings (rugs, carpets and mats), towels, washcloths, dishcloths, ironing board covers and pads, umbrellas, parasols, bats or batting, flags with heading or that are bigger than 216 square inches, cushions, all fibers, yarns and fabrics (but not packaging ribbons), furniture slip covers and other furniture covers, afghans and throws, sleeping bags, antimacassars (doilies), hammocks, dresser and other furniture scarves. For further information on these requirements, refer to the labeling requirements of the Textile Act.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::countryOfOriginTe.walmart_attribute_doc: Country of Origin - Textiles ==> Use “Made in U.S.A. and Imported” to indicate manufacture in the U.S. from imported materials, or part processing in the U.S. and part in a foreign country. Use “Made in U.S.A. or Imported” to reflect that some units of an item originate from a domestic source and others from a foreign source. Use “Made in U.S.A.” only if all units were made completely in the U.S. using materials also made in the U.S. Use "Imported" if units are completely imported.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::fabricContent.walmart_attribute_doc: Fabric Content ==> Material makeup of the item.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::vehicleType.walmart_attribute_doc: Vehicle Category ==> Grouping of different kinds of vehicles based on use and form. Important selection criteria, especially for compatibility, for products including boat components, tires and auto accessories. Vehicle Type also used for toys such as model rocket ships and remote-controlled race cars.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::autographedBy.walmart_attribute_doc: Autographed by ==> The full name of the person who has autographed this copy.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Vehicle\/VehicleOther::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::shortDescription.walmart_attribute_doc: Description ==> Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::keyFeatures/keyFeat.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Vehicle\/Watercraft::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::productSecondaryIma.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::vehicleType.walmart_attribute_doc: Vehicle Category ==> Grouping of different kinds of vehicles based on use and form. Important selection criteria, especially for compatibility, for products including boat components, tires and auto accessories. Vehicle Type also used for toys such as model rocket ships and remote-controlled race cars.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::vehicleYear.walmart_attribute_doc: Vehicle Year ==> The model year as provided by the manufacturer. If the product is a replacement part or accessory, this attribute is used to identify if a product fits a particular vehicle.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::vehicleMake.walmart_attribute_doc: Vehicle Make ==> The manufacturer’s marque, under which the vehicle is produced and sold. For example, the Toyota Motor Corporation manufactures the vehicle makes of Toyota, Lexus and Scion. If the product is a replacement part or accessory, this attribute is used to identify if a product fits a particular vehicle.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::vehicleModel.walmart_attribute_doc: Vehicle Model ==> The manufacturer’s name/letter/number designation given to a particular design or series of vehicles with similar characteristics. If the product is a replacement part or accessory, this attribute is used to identify if a product fits a particular vehicle.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::submodel.walmart_attribute_doc: Submodel ==> Any secondary designation of model for the product

Vehicle\/Watercraft::engineLocation.walmart_attribute_doc: Engine Location ==> Location of the engine in relation to a watercraft’s hull.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::engineModel.walmart_attribute_doc: Engine Model ==> The manufacturer's name given to a particular design, product line, or series of engines with similar characteristics.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::engineDisplacement\.walmart_attribute_doc: Engine Displacement ==> The combined volume, as displaced by the pistons for all cylinders of an internal combustion engine. Generally expressed in cubic centimeters up to 1000 cc, and liters thereafter, or in cubic inches. Engine displacement is often used as a rough indicator of an engine's power and potential fuel consumption.

Engine Displacement ==> The combined volume, as displaced by the pistons for all cylinders of an internal combustion engine. Generally expressed in cubic centimeters up to 1000 cc, and liters thereafter, or in cubic inches. Engine displacement is often used as a rough indicator of an engine's power and potential fuel consumption.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::boreStroke.walmart_attribute_doc: Bore x Stroke ==> The ratio between the diameter of the cylinder and the stroke of the piston.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::inductionSystem.walmart_attribute_doc: Induction System ==> Method and mechanism used to meter and direct the flow of air into an engine.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::compressionRatio.walmart_attribute_doc: Compression Ratio ==> A value representing the ratio of the volume of the combustion chamber from its largest capacity to its smallest capacity. Important specification for many common combustion engines. A gasoline- powered engine typically has a compression ratio of 10:1.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::maximumEnginePower.walmart_attribute_doc: Maximum Engine Power ==> The maximum power output of the engine as specified by the manufacturer.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::propulsionSystem.walmart_attribute_doc: Propulsion System ==> Terms describing the mechanisms the product uses to generate thrust. For powerboats, the propulsion system would include types of marine engine/drive, shaft and propeller.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::coolingSystem.walmart_attribute_doc: Cooling System ==> Method by which the engine is cooled

Vehicle\/Watercraft::thrust\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Thrust ==> Measurement of force generated by the propulsion system. Important selection factor based on desired engine power for motorboats.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::thrust\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Thrust ==> Measurement of force generated by the propulsion system. Important selection factor based on desired engine power for motorboats.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::impellerPropeller.walmart_attribute_doc: Impeller / Propeller ==> Terms describing the characteristics of an impeller or a propeller. For boat propellers this would include propeller material and diameter, and number and shape of blades.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::topSpeed.walmart_attribute_doc: Top Speed ==> The maximum speed the product can attain

Vehicle\/Watercraft::fuelRequirement.walmart_attribute_doc: Fuel Requirement ==> The type of fuel the product requires, as specified by the manufacturer. For example most land vehicles and watercraft require gasoline with a specific octane rating.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::fuelSystem.walmart_attribute_doc: Fuel System ==> Method and mechanisms used to deliver the flow of fuel into an engine. Independent of fuel type. For example, engines fueled by gasoline can have either a fuel injection or carbonated fuel system.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::fuelCapacity\/measu.walmart_attribute_doc: Fuel Capacity ==> Volume of fuel the item can hold.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::fuelCapacity\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Fuel Capacity ==> Volume of fuel the item can hold.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::averageFuelConsumpt.walmart_attribute_doc: Average Fuel Consumption ==> Amount of fuel used to cover a specific distance. For example, if a moped or boat motor uses an average of 12 gallons per mile, the value would be 12mpg
Average Fuel Consumption ==> Amount of fuel used to cover a specific distance. For example, if a moped or boat motor uses an average of 12 gallons per mile, the value would be 12mpg

Vehicle\/Watercraft::hullLength\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Hull Length ==> Maximum length of the vessel’s hull or boat body, measured parallel to the waterline.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::hullLength\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Hull Length ==> Maximum length of the vessel’s hull or boat body, measured parallel to the waterline.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::beam\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Beam ==> The measurement of width of a boat’s hull as measured at the widest point of the ship at the nominal waterline.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::beam\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Beam ==> The measurement of width of a boat’s hull as measured at the widest point of the ship at the nominal waterline.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::airDraft\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Air Draft ==> Distance from the surface of the water to the highest point on the watercraft. Important factor in determining if a boat has enough clearance to pass safely under a bridge or obstacle such as power lines.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::airDraft\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Air Draft ==> Distance from the surface of the water to the highest point on the watercraft. Important factor in determining if a boat has enough clearance to pass safely under a bridge or obstacle such as power lines.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::draft\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Draft ==> Vertical distance between the waterline and the bottom of the hull. Draft determines the minimum depth of water a ship or boat can safely navigate.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::draft\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Draft ==> Vertical distance between the waterline and the bottom of the hull. Draft determines the minimum depth of water a ship or boat can safely navigate.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::dryWeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Dry Weight ==> Weight of the item without any fluids in tanks or reservoirs. Typically used for watercraft and land vehicles.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::dryWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Dry Weight ==> Weight of the item without any fluids in tanks or reservoirs. Typically used for watercraft and land vehicles.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::waterCapacity\/meas.walmart_attribute_doc: Water Capacity ==> Volume of water that can be held by an item. Typically used for vehicles and watercraft as measure of capacity to provide water for passengers.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::waterCapacity\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Water Capacity ==> Volume of water that can be held by an item. Typically used for vehicles and watercraft as measure of capacity to provide water for passengers.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::seatingCapacity.walmart_attribute_doc: Seating Capacity ==> The number of people that can be accommodated by the available seats of an item.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::assembledProductLen.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::assembledProductWid.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::assembledProductHei.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::assembledProductWei.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.
Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::variantGroupId.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Group ID ==> Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for “Variant Group ID” and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::variantAttributeNam.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::isProp65WarningRequ.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::smallPartsWarnings\.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Vehicle\/Watercraft::hasBatteries.walmart_attribute_doc: Contains Batteries ==> "Battery or battery containing product" is defined by Company to include any item of Merchandise that is a battery or any component of Merchandise, including reusable packaging intended to stay in use with the item, containing a battery of any chemistry/ type. Mark Y if this definition applies to your product.

NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.

Watches::keyFeatures/keyFeaturesValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Key Features ==> Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format. We highly recommended using three or more key features.

Watches::brand.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand ==> Name, term, design or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others. This can be the name of the company associated with the product, but not always. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".

Watches::manufacturer.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer ==> Manufacturer is the maker of the product. This is the name of the company that produces the product, not necessarily the brand name of the item. For some products, the manufacturer and the brand may be the same.

Watches::modelNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Model Number ==> Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Watches::manufacturerPartNumber.walmart_attribute_doc: Manufacturer Part Number ==> MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching.

Watches::multipackQuantity.walmart_attribute_doc: Multipack Quantity ==> The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be "1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of "6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of "1."

Watches::countPerPack.walmart_attribute_doc: Count Per Pack ==> The number of identical items inside each individual pack given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of "50." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of "1." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of "6." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of "1."

Watches::count.walmart_attribute_doc: Total Count ==> The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1.

Watches::mainImageUrl.walmart_attribute_doc: Main Image URL ==> Main image of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Watches::productSecondaryImageURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Image URL ==> Secondary images of the item. Image URL must end in the file name. Image URL must be static and have no redirections. Preferred file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Recommended image resolution: 3000 x 3000 pixels at 300 ppi. Minimum image size requirements: Zoom capability: 2000 x 2000 pixels at 300 ppi. Non-zoom minimum: 500 x 500 pixels at 72 ppi. Maximum file size: 2 MB.

Watches::gender.walmart_attribute_doc: Gender ==> Indicate whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).

Watches::size.walmart_attribute_doc: Size ==> Overall dimensions of an item. Used only for products that do not already have a more specific 'x size' attribute, such as ring size or clothing size.

Watches::ageGroup\/ageGroupValue.walmart_attribute_doc: Age Group ==> General grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels.

Watches::material.walmart_attribute_doc: Material ==> The main material(s) that a product is made of. This does not need to be an exhaustive list, but should contain the predominant or functionally important material/materials. Fabric material specifics should be entered using the "Fabric Content" attribute.

Watches::color.walmart_attribute_doc: Color ==> Color as described by the manufacturer.

Watches::colorCategory\/colorCategoryVal.walmart_attribute_doc: Color Category ==> Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Watches::metal.walmart_attribute_doc: Metal ==> For items made primarily of metal, or where the metal component plays an important part in the makeup of the item and purchasing decision.

Watches::plating.walmart_attribute_doc: Plating ==> Metal plating. Use for items where the plating is a central feature, or important to the buying decision.

Watches::watchStyle.walmart_attribute_doc: Watch Style ==> Styles that describe an overall profile of features and form specific to wristwatches.

Watches::watchFeatures.walmart_attribute_doc: Watch Features ==> Features specific to watches.

Watches::activity.walmart_attribute_doc: Activity ==> The general type of activity one might perform while wearing this garment.

Watches::watchCaseShape.walmart_attribute_doc: Watch Case Shape ==> The watch case is the enclosure that holds the face and inner workings of the watch. Watch cases can be round or square, but also have shapes particular to watches: tonneau or cushion.

Watches::gemstone.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone ==> The gemstone trade name (i.e., amethyst, not purple quartz).

Watches::gemstoneShape.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone Shape ==> The man-made shape or cut that the gemstone has been fashioned to.

Watches::carats\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone Weight - Carats ==> Measure of the weight (mass) of gemstones and pearls. One carat (ct) is equal to 200 mg.

Watches::carats\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Gemstone Weight - Carats ==> Measure of the weight (mass) of gemstones and pearls. One carat (ct) is equal to 200 mg.

Watches::displayTechnology.walmart_attribute_doc: Display Technology ==> The primary technology used for the item's display.

Watches::isWaterproof.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Waterproof ==> Y indicates that the item has been especially made to be resistant to water, to some degree.

Watches::isWeatherResistant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Weather-Resistant ==> Y indicates that the item has been made or is marketed as being resistant to elements of weather, such as rain, wind or cold.

Watches::powerType.walmart_attribute_doc: Power Type ==> Provides information on the exact type of power used by the item.

Watches::watchBandMaterial.walmart_attribute_doc: Watch Band Material ==> Use this attribute if the material of the watch band is a particular feature or varies between similar items.

Watches::assembledProductLength\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Watches::assembledProductLength\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Length ==> The length of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Watches::assembledProductWidth\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Watches::assembledProductWidth\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Width ==> The width of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Watches::assembledProductHeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Watches::assembledProductHeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Height ==> The height of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Watches::assembledProductWeight\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Watches::assembledProductWeight\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Assembled Product Weight ==> The weight of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page.

Watches::variantAttributeNames\/variantA.walmart_attribute_doc: Variant Attribute Names ==> Designate all attributes by which the item is varying. Variant attributes are limited to those designated for each category.

Watches::isPrimaryVariant.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Primary Variant ==> Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.

Watches::isProp65WarningRequired.walmart_attribute_doc: Is Prop 65 Warning Required ==> Selecting "Y" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.

Watches::prop65WarningText.walmart_attribute_doc: Prop 65 Warning Text ==> This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label.

Watches::smallPartsWarnings\/smallPartsW.walmart_attribute_doc: Small Parts Warning Code ==> To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0 - No warning applicable; 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball; 2 - Choking hazard contains small ball; 3 - Choking hazard contains small parts; 4 - Choking hazard balloon; 5 - Choking hazard is a marble; 6 - Choking hazard contains a marble.

Watches::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_doc: Contained Battery Type ==> Please select the Battery Technology Type from the list provided. NOTE: If battery type is lead acid, lead acid (nonspillable), lithium ion, or lithium metal, please ensure that you have obtained a hazardous materials risk assessment through WERCS before setting up your item.
Watches::batteryTechnologyType.walmart_attribute_enum: Does Not Contain a Battery,Alkaline,Carbon Zinc,Lead Acid,Lead Acid (Nonspillable),Lithium Primary (Lithium Metal),Lithium Ion,Magnesium,Mercury,Nickel Cadmium,Nickel Metal Hydride,Silver,Thermal,Other,Multiple Types

Watches::hasWarranty.walmart_attribute_doc: Has Warranty ==> Y indicates the item comes with a warranty. If an item has a warranty, then enter EITHER the warranty URL or the warranty text in the appropriate field.

Watches::warrantyURL.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty URL ==> If you indicated that your item has a warranty, provide either the Warranty URL or Warranty Text. The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 2 GB. If the Ingredients have been included in another image, you may repeat the URL here.

Watches::warrantyText.walmart_attribute_doc: Warranty Text ==> If you marked Y for "Has Warranty" provide the Warranty URL or Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes.

Watches::pattern.walmart_attribute_doc: Pattern ==> Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif.

Watches::theme.walmart_attribute_doc: Theme ==> A dominant idea, meaning, or setting applied to an item. Used in a wide range of products including decorative objects, clothing, toys, and furniture. Can be an important selection criteria for consumers who want to achieve a particular ambiance for room décor or for a special occasion.

Watches::character.walmart_attribute_doc: Character ==> A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person.

Watches::globalBrandLicense.walmart_attribute_doc: Brand License ==> A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.)

Watches::occasion.walmart_attribute_doc: Occasion ==> The particular target time, event, or holiday for the product.

Watches::batteryLife\/measure.walmart_attribute_doc: Battery Life ==> Life of the device's battery under ideal conditions (maximum run time).

Watches::batteryLife\/unit.walmart_attribute_doc: Battery Life ==> Life of the device's battery under ideal conditions (maximum run time).

Watches::sportsLeague.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports League ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Watches::sportsTeam.walmart_attribute_doc: Sports Team ==> If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop.

Watches::athlete.walmart_attribute_doc: Athlete ==> A well-known athlete associated with a product, if applicable. This is used to group items in Fan Shop, not to describe a line of clothing.

Watches::autographedBy.walmart_attribute_doc: Autographed by ==> The full name of the person who has autographed this copy.

Watches::features.walmart_attribute_doc: Additional Features ==> List notable features of the item.

Watches::keywords.walmart_attribute_doc: Keywords ==> Words that people would use to search for this item. Keywords can include synonyms and related terms.
